title: Meshing Mode
des: The section describes the text command listing for Fluent in Meshing mode.
desTs: 本节介绍网格模式下Fluent的文本命令列表。

contents.des: Slits all boundary faces with cells on both sides (these cells must be in the same cell zone).          A displacement can be specified to provide thickness to the boundary.
contents.desTs: 切开两侧有单元的所有边界面（这些单元必须在同一单元区域中）。可以指定位移以提供边界的厚度。

contents.des: Contains options for copying or clearing boundary conditions when a case file is read.
contents.desTs: 包含读取案例文件时复制或清除边界条件的选项。

children.des: Clears the boundary conditions assigned to the specified face zones.
children.desTs: 清除指定给指定面区域的边界条件。

children.des: Clears the boundary conditions assigned to all the face zones.
children.desTs: 清除指定给所有面区域的边界条件。

children.des: Enables you to copy the boundary conditions from the face zone selected to the face zonesspecified.
children.desTs: 使您能够将边界条件从选定的面区域复制到指定的面区域。

contents.des: Reports the number of Delaunay violations on the triangular surface mesh and the number of isolated nodes.
contents.desTs: 报告三角形表面网格上Delaunay违规的数量以及孤立节点的数量。

contents.des: Displays the names of the duplicate surfaces and prints maximum and average distance between them.
contents.desTs: 显示重复表面的名称并打印它们之间的最大和平均距离。

contents.des: Clears marked faces.
contents.desTs: 清除有标记的面部。

contents.des: Clears nodes that were marked using the mark-duplicate-nodes command.
contents.desTs: 清除使用mark-duplicate-nodes命令标记的节点。

contents.des: Computes the bounding box for the zones specified.
contents.desTs: 计算指定区域的边界框。

contents.des: Reports the number of boundary nodes associated with edges having only one attached face.
contents.desTs: 报告与仅具有一个附着面的边关联的边界节点数量。

contents.des: Reports the number of marked faces.
contents.desTs: 报告标记面孔的数量。

contents.des: Counts the unused boundary nodes in the domain.
contents.desTs: 计算域中未使用的边界节点。

contents.des: Lists the number of boundary faces that are not used by any cell.
contents.desTs: 列出未被任何单元使用的边界面的数量。

contents.des: Lists the number of boundary nodes that are not used by any cell.
contents.desTs: 列出未被任何单元使用的边界节点数。

contents.des: Creates the bounding box for the specified zones. You can specify the zone type, name, edgelength, and the extents of the box, as required. You can also optionally create a geometry objectfrom the bounding box created.
contents.desTs: 为指定区域创建边界框。您可以根据需要指定区域类型、名称、边长和框的范围。您还可以选择从创建的边界框创建几何对象。

contents.des: Creates a cylinder by specifying the axis, radius, and edge length or three arc nodes, theaxial delta, the radial gap, and the edge length. You can also specify the prefix for the zone beingcreated, as required. You can also optionally create a geometry object from the cylindercreated.
contents.desTs: 通过指定轴、半径和边长或三个弧形节点、轴向增量、半径间隙和边长来创建圆柱体。您还可以根据需要指定要创建的区域的前置。您还可以选择从创建的圆柱体创建几何对象。

contents.des: Creates a plane surface by specifying either the axis direction, axial location, and theextents of the surface or three points defining the plane. You can also optionally create a geometryobject from the plane surface created.
contents.desTs: 通过指定轴方向、轴位置和表面范围或定义平面的三个点来创建平面表面。您也可以选择从创建的平面表面创建几何对象。

contents.des: Creates a revolved surface by rotating the specified edge through the angle specified. Specifythe number of segments, scale factor, and the pivot point and axis of rotation. You can alsooptionally create a geometry object from the revolved surface created.
contents.desTs: 通过将指定的边旋转指定的角度来创建旋转表面。指定分段数、比例因子以及轴点和旋转轴。您还可以选择从创建的旋转表面创建几何对象。

contents.des: Creates a surface by sweeping the specified edge in the direction specified. You need tospecify the distance to sweep through and the number of offsets, as required. You can alsooptionally create a geometry object from the swept surface created.
contents.desTs: 通过沿指定方向扫掠指定边来创建表面。您需要根据需要指定扫掠的距离和偏置数量。您还可以选择从创建的扫掠表面创建几何对象。

contents.des: Searches for faces on all boundary zones that have the same nodes and deletes the duplicates.
contents.desTs: 对所有边界区域上具有相同节点的面进行搜索，并删除重复项。

contents.des: Searches for faces on a specified zone that have the same nodes and deletes the duplicates.
contents.desTs: 查找指定区域上具有相同节点的面并删除重复的面。

contents.des: Enables you to remove faces with the specified number of free edges from the specifiedboundary zones.
contents.desTs: 使您能够从指定的边界区域中删除具有指定数量自由边的面。

contents.des: Enables you to delete faces in a non-contiguous region of a face zone.
contents.desTs: 使您能够删除面部区域的非连续区域中的面部。

contents.des: Enables you to delete the unconnected face-zones.
contents.desTs: 使您能够删除未连接的面部区域。

contents.des: Deletes all the boundary faces that are not used by any cell.
contents.desTs: 指定未被任何单元使用的所有边界面。

contents.des: Deletes the boundary nodes that are not used by any boundary faces.
contents.desTs: 指定未被任何边界面使用的边界节点。

contents.des: Prints the length of the shortest and longest edges on the boundary. This information is useful for setting initial mesh parameters and refinement controls.
contents.desTs: 打印边界上最短和最长边的长度。此信息对于设置初始网格参数和细化控制很有用。

contents.des: Reports the distribution of face quality in the text window.
contents.desTs: 在文本窗口中报告面部质量的分布。

contents.des: Lists the worst face skewness.
contents.desTs: 列出了最严重的面部倾斜度。

contents.des: Enables you to create and modify features.
contents.desTs: 使您能够创建和修改功能。

children.des: Copies the specified edge zone(s) to new edge zone(s).
children.desTs: 将指定的边缘区域复制到新的边缘区域。

children.des: Extracts edge loops for the specified face zone(s) based on the feature method specified. You also need to specify an appropriate value for feature angle when using the fixed-angle method.
children.desTs: 根据指定的特征方法提取指定面部区域的边缘循环。使用固定角度方法时，您还需要指定适当的特征角度值。

children.des: Deletes degenerated edges (edges where the two end nodes are the same) for the edge zone(s) specified.
children.desTs: 为指定边缘区域简化退化边缘（两个端节点相同的边缘）。

children.des: Deletes the specified edge zone(s)
children.desTs: 删除指定的边缘区域

children.des: Reports the minimum, maximum, and average edge length for the specified edge zone(s) in the console.
children.desTs: 报告控制台中指定边缘区域的最小、最大和平均边缘长度。

children.des: Associates the specified edge zone(s) with the specified face zone.
children.desTs: 将指定的边缘区域与指定的面区域关联。

children.des: Intersects the specified edge loops to create a new edge loop comprising the common edges. You can enable automatic deleting of overlapped edges and specify an appropriate intersection tolerance.
children.desTs: 相交指定的边循环以创建由公共边组成的新边循环。您可以启用自动删除重叠边并指定适当的相交容差。

children.des: Lists the name, ID, type, and count for the specified edge zone(s).
children.desTs: 列出指定边缘区域的名称、ID、类型和计数。

children.des: Merges multiple edge loops of the same type into a single loop.
children.desTs: 将多个相同类型的边循环合并为单个循环。

children.des: Orients the edges on the loop to point in the same direction.
children.desTs: 将循环上的边定向为指向同一方向。

children.des: Projects the edges of the specified loop onto the specified face zone using the specified projection method.
children.desTs: 使用指定的投影方法将指定回路的边投影到指定的面区域上。

children.des: Remeshes the specified edge loop(s), modifying the node distribution according to the specified remeshing method, spacing values, and feature angle. You can also enable quadratic reconstruction, if required.
children.desTs: 重新网格化指定的边缘循环，根据指定的重新网格化方法、间距值和特征角度修改节点分布。如果需要，您还可以启用二次重建。

children.des: Reverses the direction of the edge loop.
children.desTs: 反转边缘循环的方向。

children.des: Separates the edge zones based on the feature angle specified, and then deletes the edges having a count smaller than the minimum count specified.
children.desTs: 根据指定的特征角度分离边缘区域，然后删除计数小于指定最小计数的边缘。

children.des: Separates the specified edge loop based on connectivity and the specified feature angle.
children.desTs: 基于连接性和指定的特征角度分离指定的循环边。

children.des: Separates the edge loop based on the seed edge specified. The edge zone separation angle is used to separate the edge zone (default 40).
children.desTs: 根据指定的种子边分隔循环边。边缘区域分隔角用于分隔边缘区域（默认值为40）。

children.des: Toggles the edge type between boundary and interior.
children.desTs: 在边界和内部之间切换边类型。

children.des: Ungroups previously grouped edge zones.
children.desTs: 取消之前分组的边缘区域。

contents.des: Resolves multi-connected edges/non-manifold configurations in the boundary mesh by deleting fringes and overlaps based on threshold values specified.
contents.desTs: 通过基于指定的阈值删除条纹和重叠来解析边界网格中的多连接边/非流形配置。

contents.des: Enables you to improve boundary surfaces.
contents.desTs: 使您能够改进边界曲面。

children.des: Enables you to collapse the short edge of faces having a high aspect ratio or skewness in thespecified face zone(s).
children.desTs: 使您能够折叠指定面部区域中具有高长宽比或倾斜度的面部的短边。

children.des: Enables you to improve the boundary mesh by swapping edges based on a node degree value otherthan 6. The node degree is defined as the number of edges connected to the node.
children.desTs: 使您能够通过基于6以外的节点度数值交换边来改进边界网格。节点度数定义为连接到节点的边的数量。

children.des: Enables you to improve the boundary surface quality using skewness, size change, aspect ratio,or area as the quality measure.
children.desTs: 使您能够使用倾斜度、尺寸变化、长宽比或面积作为质量衡量标准来提高边界表面质量。

children.des: Enables you to improve the boundary surface using smoothing.
children.desTs: 使您能够使用平滑来改进边界表面。

children.des: Enables you to improve the boundary surface using edge swapping.
children.desTs: 使您能够使用边交换来改善边界表面。

contents.des: Randomly perturbs all boundary nodes based on an input tolerance. Some nodes will be perturbed less than the tolerance value, while others will be perturbed by half of the tolerance value in all three coordinate directions.
contents.desTs: 根据输入容差随机扰动所有边界节点。某些节点的扰动将小于容差值，而其他节点的扰动将小于所有三个坐标方向上的容差值的一半。

contents.des: Enables you to make the specified boundaries periodic. You can specify the type of periodicity(rotational or translational), the angle, pivot, and axis of rotation, for rotational periodicity orthe translational shift for translational periodicity.
contents.desTs: 使您能够使指定的边界具有周期性。您可以指定周期性类型（旋转或平移）、角度、枢轴和旋转轴，以指定旋转周期性或指定平移周期性的平移位移。

contents.des: Contains options for manipulating the boundary zones.
contents.desTs: 包含用于操作边界区域的选项。

children.des: Specifies whether or not unused nodes should be deleted when their face zone is deleted.
children.desTs: 指定在删除其面区域时是否应删除未使用的节点。

children.des: Enables you to change the prefix for the specified face zones.
children.desTs: 使您能够更改指定面部区域的开头。

children.des: Copies all nodes and faces of the specified face zone(s).
children.desTs: 复制指定面区域的所有节点和面。

children.des: Creates a new face zone.
children.desTs: 创建新的面部区域。

children.des: Deletes the face zone.
children.desTs: 指定面部区域。

children.des: Reverses the normal direction of the specified boundary zone(s).
children.desTs: 反转指定边界区的法向。

children.des: Specifies a new boundary zone ID. If there is a conflict, the change will be ignored.
children.desTs: 指定新的边界区ID。如果存在冲突，更改将被忽略。

children.des: Prints information about all boundary zones.
children.desTs: 打印有关所有边界区的信息。

children.des: Merges face zones.
children.desTs: 合并面区域。

children.des: Gives a face zone a new name.
children.desTs: 为面部区域赋予新名称。

children.des: Consistently orients the faces in the specified zones.
children.desTs: 一致地定向指定区域中的面。

children.des: Specifies a new origin for the mesh, to be used for face zone rotation and for periodic zone creation. The default origin is (0,0,0).
children.desTs: 指定网格的新原点，用于面区域旋转和周期性区域创建。默认原点为（0，0，0）。

children.des: Removes the suffix (characters including and after the leftmost ":") inthe face zone names.
children.desTs: 删除面部区域名称中的后缀（包括最左边的“：”和后面的字符）。

children.des: Rotates all nodes of the specified face zone(s).
children.desTs: 旋转指定面区域的所有节点。

children.des: Rotates all nodes of the model through the specified angle, based on the specified point and axis of rotation.
children.desTs: 基于指定的点和旋转轴，将模型的所有节点旋转指定的角度。

children.des: Scales all nodes of the specified face zone(s).
children.desTs: 缩放指定面分区的所有节点。

children.des: Scales all nodes of the model by multiplying the node coordinates by the specified scale factors (x, y, z).
children.desTs: 通过将节点坐标乘以指定的缩放因子（x，y，z）来缩放模型的所有节点。

children.des: Translates all nodes of the specified face zone(s).
children.desTs: 平移指定面分区的所有节点。

children.des: Translates all nodes of the model by the specified translation offsets (x, y, z).
children.desTs: 将模型的所有节点转换指定的转换偏差（x，y，z）。

children.des: Changes the boundary type of the face zone.
children.desTs: 更改面部区域的边界类型。

children.des: Enables you to manipulate user-defined groups.
children.desTs: 使您能够操作用户定义的组。

children.des: Activates the specified user-defined groups.
children.desTs: 激活指定的用户定义组。

children.des: Creates the user-defined group comprising the specified zones.
children.desTs: 创建包含指定区域的用户定义组。

children.des: Deletes the specified user-defined group.
children.desTs: 初始化指定的用户定义组。

children.des: Lists the groups in the console.
children.desTs: 列出控制台中的组。

children.des: Enables you to modify an existing group.
children.desTs: 使您能够修改现有组。

contents.des: Marks duplicate nodes. The marked nodes will appear in the grid display when nodes are displayed. For a list of duplicate nodes, set the /report/verbosity level to 2 before using the mark-duplicate-nodes command.
contents.desTs: 标记重复的节点。显示节点时，标记的节点将出现在网格显示中。对于重复节点列表，请在使用mark-duplicate-nodes命令之前将/report/verbosity级别设置为2。

contents.des: Marks intersecting faces. Intersection is detected if the line defined by any two consecutive nodes on a face intersects any face in the current domain. The marked faces will appear in the grid display when faces are displayed. For a list of intersecting faces, set the /report/verbosity level to 2 before using the mark-face-intersection command.
contents.desTs: 标记相交面。如果面上任何两个连续节点定义的线与当前域中的任何面相交，则会检测到相交。显示面时，标记的面将出现在网格显示中。对于相交面列表，请在使用标记面-相交命令之前将/report/verbosity级别设置为2。

contents.des: Marks faces that are in proximity to each other.
contents.desTs: 标记彼此接近的面孔。

contents.des: Marks the faces that are contained in a specified local refinement region.
contents.desTs: 标记指定局部细化区域中包含的面。

contents.des: Merges duplicate nodes.
contents.desTs: 合并重复的节点。

contents.des: Merges the face zones having area less than the minimum area.
contents.desTs: 合并面积小于最小面积的面部区域。

contents.des: Contains commands used to modify the boundary mesh.
contents.desTs: 包含用于修改边界网格的命令。

children.des: Finds and marks free edges and nodes and multiply-connected edges and nodes. This process is necessary if the boundary mesh has been changed with Scheme functions.
children.desTs: 查找和标记自由边和节点以及多连接边和节点。如果边界网格已使用Scheme函数更改，则需要此过程。

children.des: Clears all selections.
children.desTs: 清除所有选择。

children.des: Clears faces that were marked using the mark-skew-face command.
children.desTs: 清除使用mark-skew-face命令标记的面。

children.des: Collapses pairs of nodes, edge(s), or face(s). If a pair of nodes is selected, both the nodes are deleted and a new node is created at the midpoint of the two nodes. If a triangular face is selected, the complete face is collapsed into a single node at the centroid of the face.
children.desTs: 折叠成对的节点、边或面。如果选择了一对节点，则删除这两个节点，并在两个节点的中点创建一个新节点。如果选择了三角形面，则完整的面将折叠为面重心处的单个节点。

children.des: Creates a boundary face if the selection list contains 3 nodes and an optional zone. If the selection list contains positions, then nodes are created.
children.desTs: 如果选择列表包含3个节点和一个可选区域，则创建边界面。如果选择列表包含位置，则创建节点。

children.des: Creates a node at the midpoint between two selected nodes.
children.desTs: 在两个选定节点之间的中点创建一个节点。

children.des: Deletes all selected faces and nodes.
children.desTs: 删除所有选定的面和节点。

children.des: Moves the selected node by specified magnitude.
children.desTs: 将所选节点移动指定的幅度。

children.des: Removes the last selection from the selection list.
children.desTs: 从选择列表中删除最后一个选择。

children.des: Specifies the feature angle for consideration of holes in the geometry.
children.desTs: 指定考虑几何体中的孔的特征角度。

children.des: Lists all of the selected objects.
children.desTs: 列出所有选定对象。

children.des: Remeshes marked faces or faces based on selections in the graphics window. Select the faces tobe remeshed and specify the sizing source (constant-size,geometry, or size-field), the number of radiallayers of faces to be remeshed (rings), the feature angle to be preservedwhile remeshing the selected faces, and the size for constant size remeshing (if applicable).
children.desTs: 根据图形窗口中的选择重新网格化标记的面或面。选择要重新网格化的面并指定尺寸来源（恒定大小、几何体或尺寸域）、要重新网格化的面的辐射层数量（环）、重新网格化选定面时要查看的特征角度以及恒定大小重新网格化的大小（如果适用）。

children.des: Marks faces that should be skipped when the worst skewed face is reported using theModify Boundary dialog box. This enables you to search for the next skewedface.
children.desTs: 使用“修改边界”对话框报告最严重的倾斜面时，标记应跳过的面。这使您能够搜索下一个倾斜面。

children.des: Merges pairs of nodes. The first node selected is retained, and the second is the duplicate that is merged.
children.desTs: 合并成对的节点。选择的第一个节点被保留，第二个是合并的副本。

children.des: Moves the selected node to the selected position if the selection list contains a node and a position.
children.desTs: 如果选择列表包含节点和位置，则将所选节点移动到所选位置。

children.des: Finds the triangular face of nearest lower skewness value than that of the worst skewed face. The face ID, its skewness, the longest edge ID, and the node ID opposite to the longest edge are displayed in the console.
children.desTs: 查找倾斜度值比最差倾斜面的倾斜度值最近的三角形面。面ID、其倾斜度、最长边ID以及与最长边相对的节点ID显示在控制台中。

children.des: Repairs zones by filling all holes associated with free faces. Specify the face zones        for the repair operation.
children.desTs: 通过填充与自由面关联的所有孔来修复区域。指定修复操作的面区域。

children.des: Contains
children.desTs: 包含

children.des: Moves the selected faces from their current zone into the selected zone, if the selection list contains a zone and one or more faces.
children.desTs: 如果选择列表包含区域和一个或多个面，则将选定的面从其当前区域移动到选定区域。

children.des: Adds a cell, face, or node to the selection list by entering the name of the entity.
children.desTs: 通过输入实体名称将单元格、面或节点添加到选择列表中。

children.des: Selects a filter. The possible filters are off, cell, face, edge, node, zone, position, object, and size. If off is chosen, then when a selection is made, it is first checked to see if it is a cell, then a face, an edge, and so on. When the node filter is used, and if a cell or face is selected, the node closest to the selection point is picked. Thus, the nodes do not have to be displayed, to be picked.
children.desTs: 删除过滤器。可能的过滤器有关闭、单元格、面、边、节点、区域、位置、对象和大小。如果选择了关闭，那么在进行选择时，首先检查是否是单元格，然后是面、边等。当使用节点过滤器时，如果选择了单元格或面，则会拾取最接近选择点的节点。因此，不必显示或拾取节点。

children.des: Adds a position to the selection list by entering the coordinates of the position.
children.desTs: 通过输入职位的坐标将职位添加到选择列表中。

children.des: Selects the probe function. The possible functions are:
children.desTs: 调用probe函数。可能的函数有：

children.des: Enables you to select only visible entities (nodes, edges, faces, zones, objects) when thebox select or polygon select options are used. Ensure thatthe model is zoomed to an appropriate level for correct selection.
children.desTs: 当使用框选择或多边形选择选项时，允许您仅选择可见实体（节点、边、面、区域、对象）。确保模型缩放到适当的级别以进行正确选择。

children.des: Adds a zone to the selection list by entering the zone name or ID.
children.desTs: 通过输入区域名称或ID将区域添加到选择列表中。

children.des: Shows the current filter.
children.desTs: 显示当前筛选器。

children.des: Shows the current probe function.
children.desTs: 显示当前探测器功能。

children.des: Finds the face with the highest (worst) skewness, selects it in the graphics window, and reports its skewness and zone ID in the console window.
children.desTs: 查找具有最高（最差）偏斜度的面，在图形窗口中选择它，并在控制台窗口中报告其偏斜度和区域ID。

children.des: Enables you to select the zone for which you want to report the skewness. You can eitherspecify zone name or zone ID.
children.desTs: 使您可以选择要报告倾斜度的区域。您可以指定区域名称或区域ID。

children.des: Uses Laplace smoothing to modify the position of the nodes in the selection list. It moves the selected node to a position computed from an average of its node neighbors. The new position is an average of the neighboring node coordinates and is not reprojected to the discrete surface.
children.desTs: 使用拉普拉斯平滑修改选择列表中节点的位置。它将选定节点移动到根据其相邻节点的平均值计算的位置。新位置是相邻节点坐标的平均值，不会重新投影到离散曲面。

children.des: Splits two selected faces into four faces.
children.desTs: 将两个选定的面拆分为四个面。

children.des: Swaps boundary edges (of triangular faces) if the selection list contains edges.
children.desTs: 如果选择列表包含边，则交换（三角形面的）边界边。

children.des: Undoes the previous operation. When an operation is performed, the reverse operation is stored on the undo stack. For example, a create operation places a delete on the stack, and a delete adds a create operation.
children.desTs: 撤销上一操作。执行操作时，反向操作将存储在撤销堆栈上。例如，创建操作将删除放在堆栈上，删除添加创建操作。

contents.des: Orients the normals based on the specified material point.
contents.desTs: 根据指定的材料点定位法向。

contents.des: Prints information about the grid in the text window.
contents.desTs: 在文本窗口中打印有关网格的信息。

contents.des: Projects nodes on a selected face zone onto a target face zone. Projection can be performedbased on normal direction, closest point, or specified direction.
contents.desTs: 将选定面部区域上的节点投影到目标面部区域上。可以根据法向、最近点或指定方向进行投影。

contents.des: Restores the periodic relationship between face zones. You will          be prompted for the type (rotational or translational), method (semi-automatic, automatic,          or manual, depending on the periodicity type) and for face zones. Periodicity information          (angle, pivot point, axis of rotation, or translational shift) are read in with the mesh          file.
contents.desTs: 恢复面部区域之间的周期关系。系统会提示您输入类型（旋转或平移）、方法（半自动、自动或手动，具体取决于周期性类型）和面部区域。周期性信息（角度、轴点、旋转轴或平移位移）通过网格文件读取。

contents.des: Discusses the commands used to refine the boundary mesh.
contents.desTs: 讨论用于细化边界网格的命令。

children.des: Automatically refines a face zone based on proximity. The original face zone is treated as a background mesh. Faces are refined by multiple face splitting passes, so that no face is in close proximity to any face in the current domain.
children.desTs: 基于邻近度自动细化面区域。原始面区域被视为背景网格。面通过多个面分割过程进行细化，因此没有面与当前域中的任何面非常接近。

children.des: Clears all refinement marks from all boundary faces.
children.desTs: 清除所有边界面的所有细化标记。

children.des: Counts the number of faces marked on each boundary zone.
children.desTs: 计算每个边界区域上标记的面数。

children.des: Prints a report of the minimum and maximum size of each specified zone. This report will also tell you how many faces on each zone have been marked for refinement.
children.desTs: 打印每个指定区域的最小和最大大小的报告。此报告还将告诉您每个区域上有多少个面已标记以供细化。

children.des: Enters the local refinement menu.
children.desTs: 进入本地细化菜单。

children.des: Defines the refinement region according to the specified parameters.
children.desTs: 根据指定的参数定义细化区域。

children.des: Deletes the specified region.
children.desTs: 指定区域。

children.des: Creates a region encompassing the entire geometry.
children.desTs: 创建包含整个几何体的区域。

children.des: Lists all the refinement regions in the console.
children.desTs: 列出控制台中的所有细化区域。

children.des: Marks the faces for refinement.
children.desTs: 标记面部以进行精致。

children.des: Refines the marked faces.
children.desTs: 细化标记的面部。

contents.des: Has a set of commands for remeshing the face zones.
contents.desTs: 具有一组用于重新网格面部区域的命令。

children.des: Clears the highlighting of the triangles that are marked.
children.desTs: 清除标记的三角形的突出显示。

children.des: Remeshes (coarsens/refines) the boundary face zones based on the computed size field. Specifythe boundary face zones to be remeshed, the boundary edge zones, feature angle, and corner angle.Additionally, specify whether the current boundary face zones should be replaced by the remeshedface zones after the operation is complete.
children.desTs: 根据计算出的尺寸字段重新网格化（粗化/细化）边界面区域。指定要重新网格化的边界面区域、边界边缘区域、特征角度和拐角角度。此外，指定操作完成后是否应将当前边界面区域替换为重新网格化的面区域。

children.des: Enters the edge loop tools text menu.
children.desTs: 进入边缘循环工具文本菜单。

children.des: Toggles the deletion of region of overlap of the two surfaces.
children.desTs: 切换删除两个曲面的重叠区域。

children.des: Specifies the direction of the edge loop projection.
children.desTs: 指定循环边投影的方向。

children.des: Enters the intersect control menu.
children.desTs: 进入相交控制菜单。

children.des: Enables you to switch between the use of absolute and relative tolerance. By default, therelative tolerance value is used.
children.desTs: 使您能够在绝对容差和相对容差之间切换。默认情况下，使用相对容差值。

children.des: Enables/disables the deletion of overlapped edges. It toggles the automatic deletion of region of overlap of the two surfaces. This option is used by while remeshing overlapping zones and retriangulating prisms. By default, this option is enabled.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用删除重叠边。它可以切换自动删除两个表面的重叠区域。在重新网格重叠区域和重新定角棱镜时使用此选项。默认情况下，此选项处于启用状态。

children.des: Specifies the minimum feature angle that should be considered while retriangulating theboundary zones. All the edges in the zone having feature angle greater than the specified featureangle are retained. This option is useful for preserving the shape of the intersecting boundaryzones. The default value of feature angle is 40, however, a value in therange of 10–50 degrees is recommended. A large value may distort the shape of theintersecting boundary zones.
children.desTs: 指定重新调整边界区域时应考虑的最小要素角度。区域中要素角度大于指定要素角度的所有边都会保留。此选项对于保留相交边界区域的形状很有用。要素角度的默认值为40，但是，建议使用10-50度范围内的值。较大的值可能会扭曲相交边界区的形状。

children.des: Default is yes. If there are close-to-parallel faces, set to no to separate the zones and avoid creating an intersection loop.
children.desTs: 默认值为是。如果存在接近平行的面，请设置为否以分离区域并避免创建交叉循环。

children.des: Specifies the allowed maximum angle between the normals of the two overlapping surfaces to be joined. This parameter is used to control the size of the join region.
children.desTs: 指定要连接的两个重叠表面的法向之间允许的最大角度。此参数用于控制连接区域的大小。

children.des: Specifies the allowed maximum angle between the face normal and the project direction for the overlapping surfaces to be joined. This parameter is used to control the size of the join region.
children.desTs: 指定要连接的重叠曲面的面法线和投影方向之间允许的最大角度。此参数用于控制连接区域的大小。

children.des: Enables you to refine the regions that are modified during the intersect operations. Ittoggles the refinement of the intersecting regions after performing any of the intersectionoperation.
children.desTs: 使您能够细化相交操作期间修改的区域。它会在执行任何相交操作后切换相交区域的细化。

children.des: Used to enable or disable automatic post-remesh operation after any connect operation (join,intersect, or stitch).
children.desTs: 用于在任何连接操作（连接、相交或缝合）后启用或禁用自动重新网格后操作。

children.des: Enables you to improve the mesh. After performing any intersection operation, the slivers areremoved along the curve of intersection, Laplace smoothing is performed, and followed by the edgeswapping. Laplace smoothing is also performed for insert-edge-zone,remesh-overlapped-zones, and prism-retriangulationoptions. Smoothing is performed again. The smooth-swap operations can be controlled by changing thevarious defaults such as swapping iterations, smoothing iterations, etc.
children.desTs: 使您能够改进网格。执行任何相交操作后，沿着相交曲线去除切片，执行拉普拉斯平滑，然后进行边擦除。还对插入边区域、剩余网格重叠区域和棱镜重新调整选项执行拉普拉斯平滑。再次执行平滑。可以通过更改各种迭代来控制平滑交换操作，例如交换迭代、平滑默认值等。

children.des: Enables the automatic separation of intersected zones.
children.desTs: 支持自动分离可分配区域。

children.des: Indicates that shape of the first zone specified isto be preserved. This option is enabled by default.
children.desTs: 指示要保留指定的第一个区域的形状。默认情况下启用该选项。

children.des: Specifies the tolerance value for the intersect operations.
children.desTs: 指定相交操作的容差值。

children.des: Performs the intersection operation only within the specified tolerance value. It is useful only for the Intersect option.
children.desTs: 仅在指定容差值内执行相交操作。它仅对“相交”选项有用。

children.des: Specifies the method for projecting edge loops.
children.desTs: 指定投影边循环的方法。

children.des: Includes the selected face for proximity calculation.
children.desTs: 包括所选的面部以进行接近度计算。

children.des: Enables/disables quadratic reconstruction of edge loops.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用边缘循环的二次重建。

children.des: Specifies the method to be used for the node distribution on the edge loop.
children.desTs: 指定用于边缘循环上的节点分布的方法。

children.des: Sets the node spacing for the edge loop.
children.desTs: 设置边循环的节点间距。

children.des: Sets the tolerance for determining if two edges intersect.
children.desTs: 设置用于确定两条边是否相交的容差。

children.des: Creates edge loop of intersection for all boundary zones in current domain.
children.desTs: 为当前域中的所有边界区域创建交叉点的边环。

children.des: Creates edge loops for a specified face zone, based on feature angle.
children.desTs: 根据特征角度为指定的面区域创建边循环。

children.des: Creates an interior edge loop at the intersection between two adjacent face zones. Edges created in this way will not be remeshed by default.
children.desTs: 在两个相邻面区域之间的相交处创建内部边循环。默认情况下，以这种方式创建的边不会重新网格化。

children.des: Creates edge loop on boundary of the region of overlap of two surfaces.
children.desTs: 在两个曲面重叠区域的边界上创建循环边。

children.des: Creates edge loops for connecting two surfaces along their free  edges.
children.desTs: 创建边循环，以沿着两个表面的自由边连接两个表面。

children.des: Deletes edges that overlap selected edge loops.
children.desTs: 删除与选定边循环重叠的边。

children.des: Performs the faceted stitching of zones.
children.desTs: 执行区域的刻面缝合。

children.des: Inserts an edge zone into a triangulated boundary face zone.
children.desTs: 将边缘区域量化为三角形边界面区域。

children.des: Remeshes all the intersecting face zones.
children.desTs: 重新整理所有相交的面部区域。

children.des: Remeshes two intersecting face zones so that they become conformal.
children.desTs: 重新缝合两个相交的面部区域，使它们变得保形。

children.des: Connects all overlapping face zones using the join operation.
children.desTs: 使用连接操作连接所有重叠的面部区域。

children.des: Connects two overlapping faces.
children.desTs: 连接两个重叠的面。

children.des: Highlights the triangles in the neighborhood of the line of intersection.
children.desTs: 突出显示相交线附近的三角形。

children.des: Highlights the triangles in the neighborhood of the join edge loop.
children.desTs: 突出显示连接边循环附近的三角形。

children.des: Highlights the triangles in the neighborhood of the stitch edge  loop.
children.desTs: 突出显示缝合边循环附近的三角形。

children.des: Remeshes a specified face zone by automatically extracting edge loops. If edge loops are present in the current domain (for example, if they were created using the create-edge-loops command), they are used to remesh the specified face zone.
children.desTs: 通过自动提取边缘循环重新网格化指定的面部区域。如果当前域中存在边缘循环（例如，如果它们是使用“缝合-边缘-循环”命令创建的），则使用它们来重新网格化指定的面部区域。

children.des: Remeshes the specified face zones to a constant triangle size while maintaining conformitywith adjacent zones. Specify the boundary face zones to be remeshed, the boundary edge zones,feature angle, corner angle, and the constant size. Additionally, specify whether the currentboundary face zones should be replaced by the remeshed face zones after the operation iscomplete.
children.desTs: 将指定的面区域重新网格化为恒定的三角形大小，同时保持与邻近区域的一致性。指定要重新网格化的边界面区域、边界边缘区域、特征角度、拐角角度和恒定大小。此外，指定是否应在操作完成后用重新网格化的面区域替换当前边界面区域。

children.des: Remeshes face zones using the current size function and keeping a conformal interface between them. If no size function is defined, an error message will be generated.
children.desTs: 使用当前尺寸函数重新组合面部区域，并在它们之间保持保形界面。如果未定义尺寸函数，将生成错误消息。

children.des: Remeshes overlapping face zones. The non-overlapping region is remeshed using the edge loops created from the overlapping face zones.
children.desTs: 重新网格化重叠的面区域。使用从重叠的面区域创建的边缘循环重新网格化非重叠区域。

children.des: Enters the size functions menu where you can define size functions for controlling mesh size distribution.
children.desTs: 进入尺寸函数菜单，您可以在其中定义用于控制网格尺寸分布的尺寸函数。

children.des: Computes the size field based on the defined parameters.
children.desTs: 根据定义的参数计算大小字段。

children.des: Contains options for displaying contours of size functions.
children.desTs: 包含用于显示尺寸轮廓功能的选项。

children.des: Displays contours in the graphics window. Compute the size field using /size-functions/compute or read in a size field file prior to displaying the contours of size.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示轮廓。在显示尺寸轮廓之前，使用/size-functions/compute计算尺寸字段或读取尺寸字段文件。

children.des: Enables you to specify smaller facets if the original are too large. Default isno.
children.desTs: 如果原始面太大，您可以指定较小的面。默认值为no。

children.des: Defines the size function based on the specified parameters.
children.desTs: 根据指定的参数定义大小函数。

children.des: Creates default size functions based on face and edge curvature and proximity.
children.desTs: 基于面和边的曲率和接近度创建默认大小函数。

children.des: Deletes the specified size function or the current size field.
children.desTs: 初始化指定的大小函数或当前大小字段。

children.des: Deletes all the defined size functions.
children.desTs: 检查所有已定义的大小函数。

children.des: Removes periodicity from the size field.
children.desTs: 从大小字段中删除周期性。

children.des: Lists all the defined size functions and the parameter values defined.
children.desTs: 列出所有定义的大小函数和定义的参数值。

children.des: Resets the global controls to their default values.
children.desTs: 将全局控件重置为其默认值。

children.des: Sets the values for the global minimum and maximum size, and the growth rate.
children.desTs: 设置全局最小和最大大小的值以及增长率。

children.des: Applies periodicity to the size field by selecting one source face zone.
children.desTs: 通过选择一个源面区域，将周期性复制到尺寸字段。

children.des: Sets the tolerance relative to minimum size to take gaps into account. Gaps whose thickness is less than the global minimum size multiplied by this factor will not be regarded as a proximity gap.
children.desTs: 设置相对于最小尺寸的公差以考虑间隙。厚度小于全球最小尺寸乘以此因子的间隙不会被视为接近间隙。

children.des: Specifies the scale factor, and minimum and maximum size values to filter the size output fromthe size field.
children.desTs: 指定比例因子以及最小和最大大小值，以筛选大小字段的大小输出。

children.des: Identifies the zones comprising non-triangular elements and uses a triangulated copy of these zones for computing the size functions.
children.desTs: 初始化包含非三角形元素的区域，并使用这些区域的三角形副本来计算大小函数。

children.des: Enables/disables curvature data from the nodes of the CAD facets.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用来自CAD面节点的弯曲数据。

children.des: Connects (stitches) all the face zones along the free edges.
children.desTs: 沿着自由边缘连接（缝合）所有面部区域。

children.des: Connects two surfaces along their free edges.
children.desTs: 沿自由边连接两个曲面。

children.des: Connects (stitches) a zone to another which is connected to an existing volume mesh, whilepreserving the boundary of the zones connected to the volume mesh. Specify a list of boundary zonesto be preserved, a list of the boundary zones to be connected to each of these zones, and thetolerance value.
children.desTs: 将一个区域连接（缝合）到另一个连接到现有体积网格的区域，同时保留连接到体积网格的区域的边界。指定要保留的边界区域列表、要连接到每个区域的边界区域列表以及公差值。

children.des: Triangulates quad zones.
children.desTs: 三角测量四方区域。

contents.des: Resets the element type (mixed, tri, or quad) of a boundary zone. If you have separated a mixed (tri and quad) face zone into one tri face zone and one quad face zone, for example, each of these will be identified as a “mixed" zone. Resetting the element type for each of these new zones will identify them as, respectively, a triangular zone and a quadrilateral zone.
contents.desTs: 重置边界区域的元素类型（混合、三重或四方）。例如，如果您已将混合（三重和四方）面区域分离为一个三重面区域和一个四方面区域，则每个都将被识别为“混合”区域。重置这些新区域中的每个新区域的元素类型将分别将它们识别为三角形区域和四方形区域。

contents.des: Resolves self intersection on manifold surface meshes.
contents.desTs: 解决流管表面网格上的自交问题。

contents.des: Applies a scaling factor to all node coordinates. You can use this command to change the units of the grid.
contents.desTs: 将比例因子指定到所有节点坐标。您可以使用此命令更改网格的单位。

contents.des: Contains options for separating face zones.
contents.desTs: 包含分离面部区域的选项。

children.des: Enters the local refinement menu.
children.desTs: 进入本地细化菜单。

children.des: Enables you to define the local region.
children.desTs: 允许您定义局部区域。

children.des: Deletes the specified local region.
children.desTs: 指定指定的本地区域。

children.des: Creates a region encompassing the entire geometry.
children.desTs: 创建包含整个几何体的区域。

children.des: Lists all the local regions defined.
children.desTs: 列出定义的所有局部区域。

children.des: Marks the faces that are contained in a specified local refinement region.
children.desTs: 标记指定局部细化区域中包含的面。

children.des: Separates a boundary face zone based on significant angle.
children.desTs: 根据重要角度分离边界面区域。

children.des: Separates a boundary/interior face zone based on its cell neighbors.
children.desTs: 根据边界/内部面区域的单元邻居分离边界/内部面区域。

children.des: Separates a boundary face zone by moving marked faces to a new zone.
children.desTs: 通过将标记的面移动到新区域来分离边界面区域。

children.des: Separates a boundary face zone based on contiguous regions.
children.desTs: 基于连续区域分离边界面区域。

children.des: Separates a boundary face zone by defining a seed face on the surface.
children.desTs: 通过在表面上定义种子面来分离边界面区域。

children.des: Separates faces connected to the seed face, whose normal fall within the specified cone.
children.desTs: 分离与种子面相连的面，其法向落在指定圆锥体内。

children.des: Separates a boundary face zone based on the shape of the faces(triangular or quadrilateral).
children.desTs: 根据面的形状（三角形或四边形）分离边界面区域。

contents.des: Defines the periodicity parameters. You will be prompted for the type          of periodicity (rotational or translational). For rotational periodicity, you will be          prompted for the angle and axis of rotation parameters. For translational periodicity, you          will be prompted for the shift vector components.
contents.desTs: 定义周期性参数。系统会提示您输入周期性类型（旋转或平移）。对于旋转周期性，系统会提示您输入旋转角度和轴参数。对于平移周期性，系统会提示您输入位移分量。

contents.des: Slits a boundary face zone by duplicating all faces and nodes, except those nodes that are located at the edges of the boundary zone. A displacement can be specified to provide thickness to the boundary. The slit command only works when it is possible to move from face to face using the connectivity provided by the cells.
contents.desTs: 通过复制所有面和节点（位于边界区边缘的那些节点除外）来切割边界面区。可以指定位移来为边界提供厚度。只有当可以使用单元提供的连接性从一个面移动到另一个面时，切割命令才有效。

contents.des: Smooths the marked faces.
contents.desTs: 平滑标记的面。

contents.des: Unmarks the marked selected faces.
contents.desTs: 取消标记已标记的选定面。

list.des: the commands used for creating, managing,    modifying, deleting boundary (face) zones and surface mesh.
list.desTs: 用于创建、管理、修改、删除边界（面）区域和表面网格的命令。

contents.des: Enables you to add a prefix to the selected entities. Specify the path for the entities andthe prefix to be added.
contents.desTs: 使您能够向所选实体添加一个前置码。指定实体的路径和要添加的前置码。

contents.des: Enables you to add the selected CAD entities to an existing object. Specify the path for theentities to be added and select the object to be modified.
contents.desTs: 使您能够将选定的CAD实体添加到现有对象。指定要添加的实体的路径并选择要修改的对象。

contents.des: Enables you to create new geometry/mesh objects for the selected entities. Specify the pathfor the entities and if required, choose to create one object per CAD entity selected and/or retainthe CAD zone granularity for object creation. By default, a single object will be created for allentities selected and the CAD zone granularity will not be retained. Specify the object name (ifapplicable), object type (geom or mesh), and cellzone type (dead, fluid, orsolid).
contents.desTs: 使您能够为选定的实体创建新的几何/网格对象。指定实体的路径，如果需要，选择为每个选定的CAD实体创建一个对象和/或保留用于对象创建的CAD区域粒度。默认情况下，将为所有选定的实体创建单个对象，并且不会保留CAD区域粒度。指定对象名称（如果适用）、对象类型（地理或网格）和单元区类型（死、流体或实体）。

contents.des: Deletes all the CAD assemblies data.
contents.desTs: 初始化所有CAD装配数据。

contents.des: Displays the selected CAD entities.
contents.desTs: 显示选定的CAD实体。

contents.des: Contains additional options for displaying CAD entities.
contents.desTs: 包含用于显示CAD实体的其他选项。

children.des: Adds the selected entities to the display in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 将选定的实体添加到图形窗口中的显示中。

children.des: Displays the unlabeled zones for the selected entities in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示选定图元的未标记分区。

children.des: Removes the selected entities from the display in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 从图形窗口中的显示中删除所选实体。

contents.des: Enables you to extract the feature edge zone for the selected entities. Specify the path forthe CAD entities and the feature angle.
contents.desTs: 使您能够提取所选实体的特征边缘区域。指定CAD实体的路径和特征角度。

contents.des: Contains options for displaying and managing labels.
contents.desTs: 包含用于显示和管理标签的选项。

children.des: Adds the selected labels to the display in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 将选定的标签添加到图形窗口中的显示中。

children.des: Deletes the selected labels.
children.desTs: 删除所选标签。

children.des: Displays the selected labels.
children.desTs: 显示选定的标签。

children.des: Removes the selected labels from the display in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 从图形窗口中的显示中删除选定的标签。

children.des: Enables you to rename the selected labels. Specify the path for the labels and the new name.For multiple selections, the specified name will be used, with a suitable index as suffix. Forexample, specifying a new label name wall will result in entitieswall.1, wall.2, etc.
children.desTs: 使您能够重命名所选标签。指定标签的路径和新名称。对于多次选择，将使用指定的名称，并以合适的索引作为后缀。例如，指定新标签名称wall将导致Entitywall.1、wall.2等。

contents.des: Contains options for setting the CAD entity state.
contents.desTs: 包含用于设置CAD图元状态的选项。

children.des: Suppresses the selected CAD entities.
children.desTs: 抑制选定的CAD实体。

children.des: Unlocks the selected CAD entities.
children.desTs: 解锁选定的CAD图元。

children.des: Unsuppresses the selected CAD entities.
children.desTs: 取消抑制选定的CAD图元。

contents.des: Enables you to rename the selected entities. Specify the path for the entities and the newname. For multiple entities, the specified name will be used, with a suitable index as suffix. Forexample, specifying a new name wall will result in entitieswall.1, wall.2, etc.
contents.desTs: 使您能够重命名所选实体。指定实体和新名称的路径。对于多个实体，将使用指定的名称，并使用合适的索引作为后缀。例如，指定新名称wall将导致entitywall.1、wall.2等。

contents.des: Enables you to replace an object with the selected CAD entities. Specify the path for theentities to be added and select the object to be modified.
contents.desTs: 使您能够用选定的CAD实体替换对象。指定要添加的实体的路径并选择要修改的对象。

contents.des: Reimports the selected CAD entities using new parameters specified in theupdate-options/ menu.
contents.desTs: 使用更新选项/菜单中指定的新参数重新导入选定的CAD实体。

contents.des: Contains options for updating the CAD entities on reimport.
contents.desTs: 包含用于在重新导入时更新CAD实体的选项。

children.des: Enables you to import edge zones from the CAD entities on reimport. Specify an appropriatevalue for feature angle.
children.desTs: 使您能够在重新导入时从CAD实体导入边缘区域。为特征角度指定适当的值。

children.des: Enables you to change the CAD object granularity on reimport.
children.desTs: 使您可以在重新导入时更改CAD对象粒度。

children.des: Enables you to change the CAD zone granularity on reimport.
children.desTs: 使您能够在重新导入时更改CAD区域粒度。

children.des: Enables you to control the tessellation (faceting) during reimport. You can select eithercad-faceting or cfd-surface-mesh.
children.desTs: 使您能够在重新导入期间控制镶嵌（刻面）。您可以选择任何一个刻面或CFd-Surface-mesh。

list.des: commands used to interact with your CAD    model.
list.desTs: 用于与CAD模型交互的命令。

contents.des: Contains options for fixing problems with face connectivity on the specified object face zones     or boundary face zones.
contents.desTs: 包含用于修复指定对象面区域或边界面区域上的面连接问题的选项。

children.des: Separates island object face zones from all connected neighbors and merges them to the        connected neighboring face zone label based on minimum face count specified.
children.desTs: 将岛屿对象面区域与所有连接的邻居分离，并根据指定的最小面计数将它们合并到连接的邻近面区域标签。

children.des: Fixes deviations in the wrapped surface mesh by imprinting edges on the wrapped face zones.        Specify the number of imprint iterations and aggressive imprint iterations to be        performed.
children.desTs: 通过在包裹面区域上压印边缘来修复包裹表面网格中的偏差。指定要执行的压印迭代和积极压印迭代的数量。

children.des: Removes duplicate faces.
children.desTs: 删除重复的面孔。

children.des: Removes free faces by the method selected. The methods available are:
children.desTs: 按选定的方法对自由面进行插值。可用的方法有：

children.des: Removes free faces having the specified number of free edges.
children.desTs: 删除具有指定自由边数量的自由面。

children.des: Removes free face fringes based on the face count specified.
children.desTs: 基于指定的面数的无锯齿面条纹。

children.des: Removes free faces based on the minimum skewness specified.
children.desTs: 基于指定的最小偏斜度的自由曲面。

children.des: Removes free faces by merging nodes within the tolerance specified.
children.desTs: 通过合并指定容差内的节点来简化自由面。

children.des: Removes free faces based on the tolerance and number of steps specified.
children.desTs: 根据指定的公差和步数来卸载自由面。

children.des: Fixes invalid normals by smoothing.
children.desTs: 通过平滑修复无效的法向。

children.des: Deletes groups of island faces based on the absolute face count specified.
children.desTs: 根据指定的绝对面部计数来初始化岛屿面部组。

children.des: Fixes multiply connected faces by a combination of deleting face fringes, overlapping faces,        and disconnected faces. Specify the maximum number of fringe faces, overlapping faces, and        multiply connected edges, respectively.
children.desTs: 通过删除面条纹、重叠面和断开面的组合来修复多重连接面。分别指定条纹面、重叠面和多重连接边的最大数量。

children.des: Fixes non-manifold configurations by removing point contacts.
children.desTs: 通过删除点接触修复非总管配置。

children.des: Fixes self intersecting or folded faces. For fixing folded faces by smoothing, specify whether features should be imprinted.
children.desTs: 修复自相交或折叠面。要通过平滑固定折叠面，请指定是否应压印特征。

children.des: Fixes faces based on skewness and height criteria. Height is the perpendicular distance        between the longest edge of the triangle and the opposite node.
children.desTs: 根据倾斜度和高度标准修复面。高度是三角形最长边与相对节点之间的垂直距离。

children.des: Fixes spiked faces based on the spike angle specified.
children.desTs: 根据指定的尖峰角度修复尖峰面。

children.des: Fixes step configurations by smoothing or collapsing faces based on the angle and step width        specified.
children.desTs: 通过根据指定的角度和步宽平滑或折叠面来修复步距配置。

children.des: Removes disconnected island object face zone labels by merging the specified island object        face zones to the connected neighboring face zone label based on minimum face count        specified.
children.desTs: 根据指定的最小面计数，通过将指定的岛对象面区域合并到连接的邻近面区域标签，来删除断开连接的岛对象面区域标签。

contents.des: Allows you to manage the contents of the diagnostics summary                                        (to be printed to the console using the                                        perform-summary command. You are                                        presented with a collection of prompts for diagnostic tests                                        that you can include in or exclude from the summary. For                                        instance, you can determine whether or not to check the face                                        quality, set the maximum face skew limit, check the cell                                        quality, check for free faces, check face self proximity,                                        check isolated cells, and so on. By default, all diagnostic                                        test prompts are set to yes, with                                        the maximum face skewness limit is set to 0.99, the minimum                                        cell orthogonal limit is set to 0.01, and the maximum aspect                                        ratio limit is set to 10000.
contents.desTs: 允许您管理诊断摘要的内容（使用perform-summary命令打印到控制台。您将看到一系列诊断测试提示，您可以将其包含在摘要中或从摘要中排除。例如，您可以确定是否检查面部质量、设置最大面部倾斜限制、检查单元质量、检查自由面、检查面自接近度、检查孤立单元、等等。默认情况下，所有诊断测试提示均设置为是，最大面倾斜度限制设置为0.99，最小单元垂直限制设置为0.01，最大长宽比限制设置为10000。

contents.des: Allows you to change the default values for the number of plot                                        partitions (from 10), the automatic delta range (set to                                        0.05), and the clip cluster view factor (set to 1).
contents.desTs: 允许您更改地块分区数量（从10开始）、自动增量范围（设置为0.05）和剪辑簇视图因子（设置为1）的默认值。

contents.des: Generates a mesh diagnostics summary and prints it to the                                        console. The level of detail in the printed diagnostic                                        summary is controlled by the                                                manage-summary command,                                        however, by default, the summary includes surface and volume                                        mesh details such as the total number of faces, maximum                                        skewness, minimal cell orthogonal limit, maximum aspect                                        ratio, and so on.
contents.desTs: 生成网格诊断摘要并将其打印到控制台。打印的诊断摘要中的详细程度由manage-summary命令控制，但是，默认情况下，摘要包括表面和体积网格详细信息，例如面总数、最大倾斜度、最小单元垂直限制、最大长宽比等。

contents.des: Contains options for fixing problems related to surface mesh quality on the specified object     face zones or boundary face zones.
contents.desTs: 包含用于修复与指定物体面区域或边界面区域上的表面网格质量相关的问题的选项。

children.des: Collapses bad quality faces based on area or skewness. For collapsing based on face area,        specify the maximum face area and relative maximum area. For collapsing based on face        skewness, specify the minimum skewness and feature angle. Additionally, specify the number        of iterations and whether the boundary should be preserved.
children.desTs: 根据面积或倾斜度折叠质量不佳的面部。对于根据面部面积折叠，请指定最大面部面积和相对最大面积。对于根据面部倾斜度折叠，请指定最小倾斜度和特征角度。此外，请指定迭代次数以及是否应保留边界。

children.des: Improves the surface mesh by swapping based on the minimum skewness value and feature angle        specified. Additionally, specify the number of iterations and whether the boundary should be        preserved.
children.desTs: 通过基于指定的最小偏度值和特征角度进行交换来改进曲面网格。此外，指定迭代次数以及是否应保留边界。

children.des: Improves the surface mesh based on aspect ratio, size change, or skewness. Specify the minimum        quality value, feature angle, number of iterations, and whether the boundary should be        preserved.
children.desTs: 根据长宽比、尺寸更改或倾斜度改进表面网格。指定最小质量值、特征角度、迭代次数以及是否应保留边界。

children.des: Improves the surface mesh by smoothing. Specify the number of smoothing iterations and whether        the boundary should be preserved.
children.desTs: 通过平滑改进表面网格。指定平滑迭代次数以及是否应保留边界。

contents.des: Allows you to define the extent of the meshing diagnostics.                                        You can choose to set the diagnostics scope to selected                                        objects or not, and specify corresponding face and cell                                        zones as needed.
contents.desTs: 允许您定义网格化诊断的范围。您可以选择将诊断范围设置为所选对象或不设置，并根据需要指定相应的面和单元区域。

list.des: commands used to find and repair face zone    problems related to connectivity and quality.
list.desTs: 用于查找和修复与连接性和质量相关的面部区域问题的命令。

contents.des: Displays the grid according to the currently set parameters.
contents.desTs: 根据当前设置的参数显示网格。

contents.des: Adds annotation text to a graphics window. It willprompt you for a string to use as the annotation text, and then adialog box will prompt you to select a screen location using the mouse-probebutton on your mouse.
contents.desTs: 将注释文本添加到图形窗口。它会提示您输入一个字符串作为注释文本，然后adidix框会提示您使用鼠标上的鼠标探测按钮选择屏幕位置。

contents.des: Displays boundary cells attached to the specifiedface zones.
contents.desTs: 显示附着到指定面区域的边界单元。

contents.des: Displays only boundary zones according to the currentlyset parameters.
contents.desTs: 根据当前设置的参数仅显示边界区域。

contents.des: Sets the camera target to be the center (centroid)of an entity.
contents.desTs: 将相机目标设置为实体的中心（重心）。

contents.des: Clears the active graphics window. This option isuseful when you redo an overlay.
contents.desTs: 清除活动图形窗口。当您重新制作叠加时，此选项很有用。

contents.des: Removes all annotations and attachment lines fromthe active graphics window.
contents.desTs: 从活动图形窗口中删除所有注释和附着线。

contents.des: Draws cells that are neighbors for the selected faces.
contents.desTs: 绘制所选面的邻居单元。

contents.des: Draws cells that are connected to the selected nodes.
contents.desTs: 绘制连接到选定节点的单元。

contents.des: Draws cells that are connected to the selected entities.
contents.desTs: 绘制连接到选定实体的单元。

contents.des: Draws the boundary/cell zones using the zone ID specifiedas input.
contents.desTs: 使用指定为输入的区域ID绘制边界/单元区域。

contents.des: Contains commands for displaying objects.
contents.desTs: 包含用于显示对象的命令。

children.des: Displays the objects that are in the neighborhood of the selected object. The neighboring                objects have to be in contact, or intersecting the selected object.
children.desTs: 显示所选对象附近的对象。邻近对象必须与所选对象接触或相交。

children.des: Displays the objects with similar area to the selected objectarea.
children.desTs: 显示面积与选定对象区域相似的对象。

children.des: Explodesthe objects in the geometry. (This command is valid only when thegeometry is an assembled mode.)
children.desTs: 分解几何体中的对象。(This命令仅在几何图形为组装模式时有效。）

children.des: Hides the selected objects in the display.
children.desTs: 在显示中隐藏选定的对象。

children.des: Implodesor assembles the objects in the geometry. (This command is availableonly when the geometry is an exploded mode.)
children.desTs: Implodesor组装几何体中的对象。(This仅当几何体为分解模式时，命令才可用。）

children.des: Displays only the selected objects.
children.desTs: 仅显示选定的对象。

children.des: Makes the geometry transparent so that internal objects are visible.This command works as a toggle undoing the transparency of the previouslyselected objects.
children.desTs: 使几何体透明，以便内部对象可见。此命令用作取消先前选定对象透明度的切换。

children.des: Selects all the visible objects in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中删除所有可见对象。

children.des: Unhidesall the objects in the geometry and displays them.
children.desTs: 取消几何体中的所有对象并显示它们。

children.des: Toggles the colors of the geometry. In one mode geometry is coloredobject-wise while in the other mode it is colored zone-wise.
children.desTs: 切换几何图形的颜色。在一种模式中，几何图形是按颜色对象绘制的，而在另一种模式中，几何图形是按区域绘制的。

children.des: Toggles the color palette of the geometry.
children.desTs: 切换几何体的调色板。

contents.des: Redraws the grid in the graphics window.
contents.desTs: 在图形窗口中重新绘制网格。

contents.des: Saves a picture file of the active graphics window.
contents.desTs: 卸载活动图形窗口的图片文件。

contents.des: Contains options controlling the display of the grid.
contents.desTs: 包含控制网格显示的选项。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of all cells.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用所有单元格的显示。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of all faces.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用所有面部的显示。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of all nodes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用所有节点的显示。

children.des: Sets the lower and upper bounds of quality for cells to be displayed.Only cells with a quality measure value (for example, skewness) withinthe specified range will be displayed.
children.desTs: 设置要显示的单元格的质量上下限。仅显示质量度量值（例如，偏度）在指定范围内的单元格。

children.des: Resetsthe grid display parameters to their default values.
children.desTs: 将网格显示参数重置为其默认值。

children.des: Sets the lower and upper bounds of quality for faces to be displayed.Only faces with a quality measure value (for example, skewness) withinthe specified range will be displayed.
children.desTs: 设置要显示的面的质量下限和上限。仅显示质量测量值（例如，倾斜度）在指定范围内的面。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe drawing of faces/nodes that have no neighboring face on at leastone edge.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用绘制至少一条边没有相邻面的面/节点。

children.des: Sets the alignment of labels that appear in the graphics window.By default, the label is centered on the node, cell, and so on, towhich the label refers. You can specify *,ˆ, v, <, > for center, top, bottom, left, or right. You can also combine symbols—forexample, "*v" for bottom center.
children.desTs: 设置图形窗口中出现的标签的对齐方式。默认情况下，标签以标签所引用的节点、单元格等为中心。您可以指定 *、、v、<、>作为中心、顶部、底部、左或右。您还可以组合符号-例如，“*v”作为底部中心。

children.des: Setsthe label font. By default, all labels appear in “sans serif"font. Some other choices are roman, typewriter, and stroked.
children.desTs: 设置标签字体。默认情况下，所有标签都以“sans serif“字体显示。其他选项包括罗马字体、打字机字体和描边字体。

children.des: Scalesthe size of the label.
children.desTs: 缩放标签的大小。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of labels.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用标签的显示。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of left-handed faces.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用左撇子脸的显示。

children.des: Lists allthe grid display settings.
children.desTs: 列出所有网格显示设置。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of marked nodes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用标记节点的显示。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of those faces/nodes that have more than one neighboringface on an edge.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用在一条边上有多个相邻面的面/节点的显示。

children.des: Sets the x, y, and z range to be within a specified neighborhoodof a specified grid object.
children.desTs: 将x、y和z范围设置在指定网格对象的指定邻居内。

children.des: Setsthe node symbol scaling factor.
children.desTs: 设置节点符号缩放因子。

children.des: Specifiesthe node symbol.
children.desTs: 指定节点符号。

children.des: Sets the scale factor for face normals.
children.desTs: 设置面法线的比例因子。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of face normals.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用面法线的显示。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of those faces that have been marked for refinement.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用那些已标记以进行细化的面部的显示。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of tagged nodes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用标记节点的显示。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of nodes and faces that have not been meshed.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用未网格化的节点和面的显示。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of unused nodes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用未使用的节点的显示。

children.des: Limitsthe display of grid objects to the specified x-range.
children.desTs: 将栅格对象的显示限制在指定的x范围内。

children.des: Limitsthe display of grid objects to the specified y-range.
children.desTs: 将栅格对象的显示限制在指定的y范围内。

children.des: Limitsthe display of grid objects to the specified z-range.
children.desTs: 将网格对象的显示限制在指定的z范围内。

contents.des: Sets the separator character to be used to determinethe common prefix for items listed in the selection lists, when thetree view is used.
contents.desTs: 设置分隔符，当使用树视图时，该分隔符用于确定选择列表中所列项目的公共前缀。

contents.des: Enables you to enter the set menu to set the displayparameters.
contents.desTs: 使您可以进入设置菜单来设置显示参数。

children.des: Enablesyou to enter the colors options menu.
children.desTs: 允许您进入颜色选项菜单。

children.des: Sets the color of axisymmetric faces.
children.desTs: 设置轴对称面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the background (window) color.
children.desTs: 设置背景（窗口）颜色。

children.des: Enables you to specify that the entities should becolored by their type or ID.
children.desTs: 使您可以指定实体应按其类型或ID着色。

children.des: Enables you to view the partitions by color. Thiscommand applies to parallel processing.
children.desTs: 使您能够按颜色查看分区。此命令适用于并行处理。

children.des: Sets the color of far field faces.
children.desTs: 设置远场面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the foreground (text and window frame) color.
children.desTs: 设置前景（文本和窗框）颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of free surface faces.
children.desTs: 设置自由表面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color theme for the graphics window. The color options                        (black, white,                        gray-gradient, or                        workbench) are for the background display, but                      changing the theme also changes the default colors for items that display in                      the graphics windows, like faces and edges.
children.desTs: 设置图形窗口的颜色主题。颜色选项（黑色、白色、灰色渐变或工作台）用于背景显示，但更改主题也会更改图形窗口中显示的项（如面和边）的默认颜色。

children.des: Sets the highlight color.
children.desTs: 设置高光颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of the inlet faces.
children.desTs: 设置入口面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of grid interface faces.
children.desTs: 设置网格界面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of the interior faces.
children.desTs: 设置内部面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of the internal interface faces.
children.desTs: 设置内部界面的颜色。

children.des: Lists the colors available for the selected zone type.
children.desTs: 列出所选区域类型可用的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of the outlet faces.
children.desTs: 设置出口面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of the overset faces.
children.desTs: 设置重叠面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of periodic faces.
children.desTs: 设置周期面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of RANS/LES interface faces.
children.desTs: 设置RANS/LES界面的颜色。

children.des: Resets the individual grid surface colors to the defaults.
children.desTs: 将各个网格表面颜色重置为默认值。

children.des: Resets individual grid surface colors to the defaults.
children.desTs: 将各个网格表面颜色重置为默认值。

children.des: Lists the current defined user colors.
children.desTs: 列出当前定义的用户颜色。

children.des: Sets the number of labels to be skipped in the colormapscale.
children.desTs: 设置色彩地图比例中要跳过的标签数量。

children.des: Sets the color of surfaces.
children.desTs: 设置表面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of symmetric faces.
children.desTs: 设置对称面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color for traction faces.
children.desTs: 设置牵引面的颜色。

children.des: Enables you to change the color for the specifiedzone.
children.desTs: 使您能够更改指定区域的颜色。

children.des: Sets color for wall faces.
children.desTs: 设置墙壁面的颜色。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe display of face/cell edges.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用面/单元格边缘的显示。

children.des: Enables/disables the filled grid option. When a grid is not filled,only its outline is drawn.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用填充网格选项。当网格未填充时，仅绘制其轮廓。

children.des: Entersthe lights menu.
children.desTs: 进入灯光菜单。

children.des: Turns the light that moves with the camera on or off. This is controlled                      automatically by default.
children.desTs: 打开或关闭相机时移动的灯光。默认情况下，这是自动控制的。

children.des: Sets the lighting interpolation method to be used. You can choose                        automatic, flat,                        gouraud, or phong.                      "Automatic" automatically picks the best lighting method for the display in                      the graphics window. Flat is the most basic method, and the others are more                      sophisticated and provide smoother gradations of color.
children.desTs: 设置要使用的照明插值方法。您可以选择自动、平面、gouraud或phong。“自动”会自动选择图形窗口中显示的最佳照明方法。扁平是最基本的方法，其他方法更复杂，并提供更平滑的颜色渐变。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of all lights.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用所有灯光的显示。

children.des: Sets the ambient color for the scene. The ambientcolor is the background light color in scene.
children.desTs: 设置场景的环境颜色。环境颜色是场景中的背景光颜色。

children.des: Adds or modifies a directional, colored light.
children.desTs: 添加或修改方向性彩色光。

children.des: Setsthe line width factor for the window.
children.desTs: 设置窗口的线宽度系数。

children.des: Resets graphics window parameters to optimal settings for a local display.
children.desTs: 将图形窗口参数重置为本地显示的最佳设置。

children.des: Turnsoverlays on and off.
children.desTs: 轮流休息。

children.des: Savesa hardcopy file of the active graphics window.
children.desTs: 保存活动图形窗口的硬拷贝文件。

children.des: Contains the available color modes.
children.desTs: 包含可用的颜色模式。

children.des: Selects full color and plots the hardcopy in color.
children.desTs: 初始化全颜色并以彩色绘制硬拷贝。

children.des: Selects gray scale (that is, various shades of gray)and converts color to gray-scale for hardcopy.
children.desTs: 初始化灰度（即各种灰度）并将颜色转换为硬拷贝的灰度。

children.des: Displays the current hardcopy color mode.
children.desTs: 显示当前硬拷贝颜色模式。

children.des: Selects color to monochrome (black and white) forhardcopy.
children.desTs: 将彩色打印件转换为单色打印件（黑白）。

children.des: Specifies the resolution in dots per inch for EPSand PostScript files.
children.desTs: 以每英寸的点数为单位指定EPA和收件箱文件的分辨率。

children.des: Contains the available hardcopy formats.
children.desTs: 包含可用的硬拷贝格式。

children.des: Sets the command to dump a graphics window to a file.
children.desTs: 设置将图形窗口转储到文件的命令。

children.des: Sets the Encapsulated PostScript format.
children.desTs: 设置封装格式。

children.des: Sets the JPEG image format.
children.desTs: 设置JPEG图像格式。

children.des: Displays the current hardcopy format.
children.desTs: 显示当前硬拷贝格式。

children.des: Enables you to set hardcopy options, such as landscapeorientation, pen speed, and physical size. The options may be enteredon one line if you separate them with commas.
children.desTs: 使您能够设置硬拷贝选项，例如收件箱方向、笔速和物理大小。如果您用逗号分开，这些选项可能会在一行中输入。

children.des: Sets the PNG image format.
children.desTs: 设置PNG图像格式。

children.des: Contains commands for setting the PostScript driverformat and save files in PS files that can be printed quickly.
children.desTs: 包含设置打印机驱动程序格式的命令，并将文件保存为可以快速打印的PS文件。

children.des: Enables a raster file that may be larger than thestandard raster file, but will print much more quickly.
children.desTs: 启用可能比标准格栅文件大但打印速度更快的格栅文件。

children.des: Enables the standard raster file.
children.desTs: 启用标准格栅文件。

children.des: Enables a run-length encoded raster file that willbe about the same size as the standard raster file, but will printslightly more quickly. This is the default file type.
children.desTs: 启用运行长度编码的格栅文件，其大小与标准格栅文件大致相同，但打印速度稍快。这是默认文件类型。

children.des: Enables the standard vector file.
children.desTs: 启用标准载体文件。

children.des: Sets the PostScript format.
children.desTs: 设置收件箱格式。

children.des: Sets the PPM format.
children.desTs: 设置BPM格式。

children.des: Sets the TIFF format.
children.desTs: 设置Tivf格式。

children.des: Sets the VRML format.
children.desTs: 设置TLR格式。

children.des: Enables/disables the exchange of foreground/backgroundcolors for hardcopy files.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用硬拷贝文件的前景色/背景色交换。

children.des: Controls the size and quality of how JPEG files are saved based on a scale                      of 0-100, with zero being low quality small files and 100 being high quality                      larger files.
children.desTs: 根据0-100的比例控制JPEG文件的保存方式的大小和质量，0表示低质量的小文件，100表示高质量的大文件。

children.des: Toggles between landscape or portrait orientation.
children.desTs: 在横向或纵向方向之间切换。

children.des: Applies the settings of the color-mode, invert-background,and landscape options to the currently active graphics window to previewthe appearance of printed hardcopies.
children.desTs: 将颜色模式、反向背景和横向选项的设置初始化到当前活动的图形窗口，以预览打印硬拷贝的外观。

children.des: Disables/enables the use of the current graphics window resolution when                      saving an image of the graphics window. If disabled, the resolution will be as                      specified for x-resolution and                        y-resolution.
children.desTs: 当保存图形窗口的图像时，禁用/启用当前图形窗口分辨率。如果禁用，分辨率将与x分辨率和y分辨率相同。

children.des: Sets the width of the raster format images in pixels(0 implies that the hardcopy should use the same resolution as theactive graphics window).
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置格栅格式图像的宽度（0意味着硬拷贝应使用与活动图形窗口相同的分辨率）。

children.des: Sets the height of the raster format images in pixels(0 implies that the hardcopy should use the same resolution as theactive graphics window).
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置格栅格式图像的高度（0意味着硬拷贝应使用与活动图形窗口相同的分辨率）。

children.des: Re-rendersthe current window after modifying the variables in the set menu.
children.desTs: 修改设置菜单中的变量后重新渲染当前窗口。

children.des: Adjusts graphics window parameters to optimal settings for a remote display.
children.desTs: 将图形窗口参数调整为远程显示的最佳设置。

children.des: Contains the commands that enable you to set options that determinehow the scene is rendered.
children.desTs: 包含使您能够设置确定场景渲染方式的选项的命令。

children.des: Enables you to specify the animation option as appropriate.
children.desTs: 使您能够根据需要指定动画选项。

children.des: Uses a solid-tone shading representation of all geometryduring mouse manipulation.
children.desTs: 在鼠标操作期间使用所有几何图形的单色着色表示。

children.des: Uses a wireframe representation of all geometry duringmouse manipulation. This is the default option.
children.desTs: 在鼠标操作期间使用所有几何体的线框表示。这是默认选项。

children.des: Enables mouse view rotations to continue to spin thedisplay after the button is released.
children.desTs: 释放按钮后，允许鼠标视图旋转继续旋转显示。

children.des: Sets the color bar alignment.
children.desTs: 设置色条对齐方式。

children.des: Prints out information about your graphics driver.
children.desTs: 打印出有关图形驱动程序的信息。

children.des: Enables or disables double buffering. Double bufferingdramatically reduces screen flicker during graphics updates. If yourdisplay hardware does not support double buffering and you turn thisoption on, double buffering will be done in software. Software doublebuffering uses extra memory.
children.desTs: 启用或禁用双缓冲。双缓冲可显著减少图形更新期间的屏幕闪烁。如果您的显示器硬件不支持双缓冲，而您打开了此选项，则双缓冲将在软件中完成。软件双缓冲使用额外的内存。

children.des: Changes the current graphics driver. When enabling graphics display, you                      have various options: for Linux, the available drivers include                        opengl and x11; for                      Windows, the available drivers include opengl,                        dx11 (for DirectX 11), and                        msw (for Microsoft Windows). You can also disable                      the graphics display window by entering null. For a                      comprehensive list of the drivers available to you, press the                        Enter key at the driver>                      prompt.
children.desTs: 更改当前的图形驱动程序。启用图形显示时，您有各种选项：对于Linux，可用的驱动程序包括opengl和x11;对于Windows，可用的驱动程序包括opengl、dx 11（对于Direct 11）和msw（对于Microsoft Windows）。您还可以通过输入空来禁用图形显示窗口。有关可用驱动程序的全面列表，请在驱动程序>提示处按下输入键。

children.des: Sets the face displacement (in Z-buffer units alongthe camera Z-axis) for the displayed geometry when both faces andedges are displayed simultaneously.
children.desTs: 当同时显示两个面和边缘时，为显示的几何体设置面位移（以沿相机Z轴的Z缓冲区单位）。

children.des: Sets the color of the help text on the screen. Youcan select black, default, or white.
children.desTs: 设置屏幕上帮助文本的颜色。您可以选择黑色、默认或白色。

children.des: Turns hidden line removal on or off. This commandis available only when the color scheme is set to classic.
children.desTs: 打开或关闭隐藏线删除。此命令仅在配色方案设置为经典时可用。

children.des: Enables you to select the hidden line removal algorithm.
children.desTs: 使您能够选择隐藏线删除算法。

children.des: Enables you to remove hidden lines for surfaces thatare very close together. This option should be used only if the defaultalgorithm does not produce suitable results.
children.desTs: 使您能够删除非常接近的表面的隐藏线。只有在默认许可证不能产生合适的结果时才应使用此选项。

children.des: Is the default hidden line removal algorithm.
children.desTs: 是默认的隐藏线删除算法。

children.des: Enables you to choose from among the hidden surfaceremoval methods that are supported. These options (listed below) aredisplay hardware dependent.
children.desTs: 使您能够从支持的隐藏表面删除方法中进行选择。这些选项（如下所列）取决于显示硬件。

children.des: Is the fastest method if your hardware supports it.The accuracy and speed of this method is hardware dependent.
children.desTs: 如果您的硬件支持，这是最快的方法。此方法的准确性和速度取决于硬件。

children.des: Will show less edge-aliasing effects than hardware-z-buffer. This method is often used insteadof software-z-buffer when memory is limited.
children.desTs: 将显示出比硬件z-buffer更少的边缘锯齿效应。当内存有限时，通常使用这种方法来代替软件z-buffer。

children.des: Is the fastest of the accurate software methods available(especially for complex scenes), but it is memory intensive.
children.desTs: 是可用的准确软件方法中最快的一种（尤其是对于复杂场景），但它内存密集型。

children.des: Is a fast software method, but it is not as accurateas software-z-buffer.
children.desTs: 是一种快速的软件方法，但不如software-z-buffer准确。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of hidden surfaces.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用隐藏表面的显示。

children.des: Enables/disables the visibility of outer faces during display.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用显示期间外部面的可见性。

children.des: Sets the rendering options.
children.desTs: 设置渲染选项。

children.des: Controls whether or not the mesh edges are drawn.
children.desTs: 控制是否绘制网格边。

children.des: Resets the graphics system.
children.desTs: 重置图形系统。

children.des: Sets shrinkage of both faces and cells. A value of zero indicatesno shrinkage, while a value of one would shrink the face or cell toa point.
children.desTs: 设置面和单元格的收缩率。值为零表示没有收缩，而值为一会将面或单元格收缩到一个点。

children.des: Containscommands for setting the display style for the different types ofnodes and faces that can be displayed.
children.desTs: 包含用于为可以显示的不同类型的节点和面设置显示样式的命令。

children.des: Indicates cells within the specified cell qualityrange.
children.desTs: 指示指定单元格质量范围内的单元格。

children.des: Indicates cells within the specified cell size range.
children.desTs: 指示指定单元格大小范围内的单元格。

children.des: Indicates faces within the specified face qualityrange.
children.desTs: 指示指定面部质量范围内的面部。

children.des: Indicates faces within the specified face size range.
children.desTs: 指示指定面部大小范围内的面部。

children.des: Indicates free nodes or faces.
children.desTs: 表示自由节点或面。

children.des: Indicates faces that do not follow the right-handrule with respect to their cell neighbors.
children.desTs: 表示相对于其单元邻居不遵循右手规则的面部。

children.des: Indicates marked objects (for expert users).
children.desTs: 指示标记的对象（适合专家用户）。

children.des: Indicates multiply-connected nodes or faces.
children.desTs: 指示多连接的节点或面。

children.des: Indicates boundary faces to be refined.
children.desTs: 指示要细化的边界面。

children.des: Indicates tagged objects (for expert users).
children.desTs: 指示已标记的对象（适用于专家用户）。

children.des: Indicates unmeshed nodes or faces.
children.desTs: 指示未网格化的节点或面。

children.des: Indicates unused nodes or faces.
children.desTs: 指示未使用的节点或面。

children.des: Sets theproblem title.
children.desTs: 设置问题标题。

children.des: Entersthe windows options menu, which contains commands that enable youto customize the relative positions of sub-windows inside the activegraphics window.
children.desTs: 进入窗口选项菜单，其中包含使您能够自定义活动图形窗口内子窗口的相对位置的命令。

children.des: Sets the aspect ratio of the active window.
children.desTs: 设置活动窗口的长宽比。

children.des: Enters the axes window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入轴窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the axeswindow.
children.desTs: 设置是否在轴窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the transparency of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的透明度。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的上边界。

children.des: Controls the visibility of the axes window.
children.desTs: 控制轴窗口的可见性。

children.des: Enters the main view window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入主视图窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the mainviewing window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在主查看窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Controls the visibility of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 控制主查看窗口的可见性。

children.des: Enters the color scale window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入颜色比例窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the colorscale window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在颜色缩放窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the transparency of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置色标窗口的透明度。

children.des: Sets the font size of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的字体大小。

children.des: Sets the number format of the color scale window (forexample, %0.2e).
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的数字格式（forexample，%0.2e）。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the margin of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的页边距。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Controls the visibility of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 控制颜色比例窗口的可见性。

children.des: Enters the text window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入文本窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Shows or hides the application name in the picture.
children.desTs: 在图片中显示或隐藏应用程序名称。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the textwindow.
children.desTs: 设置是否在文本周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Enables/disables the transparency of the text window.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用文本窗口的透明度。

children.des: Shows or hides the company name in the picture.
children.desTs: 在图片中显示或隐藏公司名称。

children.des: Shows or hides the date in the picture.
children.desTs: 在图片中显示或隐藏日期。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Controls the visibility of the text window.
children.desTs: 控制文本窗口的可见性。

children.des: Contains options for modifying a video. This menuis not relevant for the meshing mode.
children.desTs: 包含修改视频的选项。此菜单与网格模式无关。

children.des: Sets the background color of the graphics window.The color is specified as a string of three comma-separated numbersbetween 0 and 1, representing red, green, and blue. For example, tochange the background from black (default) to gray, you would enter".5,.5,.5" after selecting the background command.
children.desTs: 设置图形窗口的背景颜色。该颜色指定为一个由0到1之间的三个逗号分隔的数字组成的字符串，代表红色、绿色和蓝色。例如，要将背景从黑色（默认）更改为灰色，您需要在选择背景命令后输入“.5，.5，.5”。

children.des: Sets the video color filter. For example, to change the color filter from its default setting                            to PAL video with a saturation of 80% and a brightness of 90%, you would                            enter "video=pal,sat=.8,gain=.9" after selecting the                              color-filter command.
children.desTs: 设置视频彩色滤镜。例如，要将彩色滤镜从默认设置更改为饱和度为80%、亮度为90%的PAL视频，您需要在选择彩色滤镜命令后输入“video=pal，sat=.8，gain =.9”。

children.des: Sets the foreground (text) color of the graphics window.The color is specified as a string of three comma-separated numbersbetween 0 and 1, representing red, green, and blue. For example, tochange the foreground from white (default) to gray, you would enter".5,.5,.5" after selecting the foreground command.
children.desTs: 设置图形窗口的前景（文本）颜色。该颜色指定为一个由0到1之间的三个逗号分隔的数字组成的字符串，代表红色、绿色和蓝色。例如，要将前景从白色（默认）更改为灰色，您需要在选择前景命令后输入“.5，.5，.5”。

children.des: Enables or disables the video picture settings.
children.desTs: 启用或禁用视频图片设置。

children.des: Sets the window size in pixels.
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置窗口大小。

children.des: Enters the XY plot window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入XY打印窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the XYplot window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在XY绘图窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Controls the visibility of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 控制XY打印窗口的可见性。

children.des: Toggles the display of the clipping plane's triad.
children.desTs: 切换剪裁平面三轴空间的显示。

contents.des: Contains commands that enable you to update the scenedescription.
contents.desTs: 包含使您能够更新场景描述的命令。

children.des: Deletesthe geometry selected using the select-geometry command.
children.desTs: 删除使用select-geometry命令选择的几何图元。

children.des: Displaysthe geometry selected using the select-geometry command.
children.desTs: 显示使用select-geography命令选择的几何体。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe drawing of the bounding frame.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用边界框的绘制。

children.des: Enables/disablesthe overlays option.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用叠加选项。

children.des: Enables you to select the geometry to be updated.
children.desTs: 使您能够选择要更新的几何图形。

children.des: Enablesyou to change the frame options.
children.desTs: 使您能够更改框架选项。

children.des: Enablesyou to apply the transformation matrix to the geometry selected usingthe select-geometry command.
children.desTs: 使您能够将变换矩阵应用于使用select-geography命令选择的几何体。

contents.des: Enters the view window options menu.
contents.desTs: 进入查看窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Scalesand centers the current scene without changing its orientation.
children.desTs: 缩放当前场景并将其中心化，而不更改其方向。

children.des: Containscommands to set the camera options.
children.desTs: 包含设置相机选项的命令。

children.des: Enables you to move the camera left, right, up, down,in, and out.
children.desTs: 使您能够向左、右、上、下、进出移动相机。

children.des: Enables you to set the field of view (width and height)of the scene.
children.desTs: 使您能够设置场景的视野（宽度和高度）。

children.des: Enables you to move the camera around the target.Gives the effect of circling around the target.
children.desTs: 使您能够围绕目标移动相机。产生围绕目标盘旋的效果。

children.des: Gives you the effect of sweeping the camera acrossthe scene. The camera remains at its position but its target changes.
children.desTs: 为您提供将相机扫过场景的效果。相机保持在其位置，但其目标发生变化。

children.des: Sets the camera position.
children.desTs: 设置相机位置。

children.des: Lets you switch between perspective and orthographicviews.
children.desTs: 允许您在透视视图和正射视图之间切换。

children.des: Lets you adjust the camera up-vector.
