children.desTs: 允许您调整相机向上方向。

children.des: Sets the point the camera will look at.
children.desTs: 设置相机将观看的点。

children.des: Sets the camera up-vector.
children.desTs: 设置相机向上方向。

children.des: Adjusts the camera’s field of view. This operationis similar to dollying the camera in or out of the scene. Dollyingcauses objects in front to move past you. Zooming changes the perspectiveeffect in the scene (and can be disconcerting).
children.desTs: 调整相机的视野。此操作类似于将相机放入或移出场景。抚摸会导致前面的物体从您身边移动。缩放会改变场景中的透视效果（并且可能会令人不安）。

children.des: Resets the view to front and center.
children.desTs: 将视图重置为正面和中心。

children.des: Deletesa particular view from the list of stored views.
children.desTs: 从存储的视图列表中删除特定视图。

children.des: Returnsto the camera position before the last manipulation.
children.desTs: 返回到上次操作前的摄像机位置。

children.des: Listsall predefined and saved views.
children.desTs: 列出所有预定义和保存的视图。

children.des: Readsviews from an external view file.
children.desTs: 从外部视图文件中读取视图。

children.des: Sets the current view to one of the stored views.
children.desTs: 将当前视图设置为存储的视图之一。

children.des: Savesthe currently displayed view into the list of stored views.
children.desTs: 将当前显示的视图保存到存储的视图列表中。

children.des: Writesviews to an external view file.
children.desTs: 将视图写入外部视图文件。

contents.des: Enters the XY plot menu.
contents.desTs: 进入XY打印菜单。

children.des: Plots a histogram of cell quality.
children.desTs: 绘制细胞质量直方图。

children.des: Plots a histogram of face quality.
children.desTs: 绘制面部质量的图表。

children.des: Enablesyou to choose a file from which to create an xy plot.
children.desTs: 使您能够选择要创建XY图的文件。

children.des: Enters theset window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入集窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets the range for the x- and y-axis. If auto-scalingis not activated for a particular axis, you will be prompted for theminimum and maximum data values.
children.desTs: 设置x轴和y轴的范围。如果特定轴的自动缩放未激活，则会提示您输入最小和最大数据值。

children.des: Sets the color of the field within the abscissa andordinate axes.
children.desTs: 设置横坐标和纵坐标轴内字段的颜色。

children.des: Sets the parameters for plot lines.
children.desTs: 设置地块线的参数。

children.des: Sets the parameters for data markers.
children.desTs: 设置数据标记的参数。

children.des: Sets the visibility and title of the description boxthat displays the markers and/or lines with their associated data.The key can be positioned and resized using the left mouse button.
children.desTs: 设置描述框的可见性和标题，该描述框显示标记和/或线及其相关数据。可以使用鼠标左按钮定位该关键点并调整其大小。

children.des: Sets the strings that define the x- and y- axis labels.
children.desTs: 设置定义x轴和y轴标签的字符串。

children.des: Sets the pattern, weight, and color of the plot lines.
children.desTs: 设置地块线的图案、权重和颜色。

children.des: Enables/disables the log scaling on the x- and y-axis.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用x轴和y轴上的日志缩放。

children.des: Sets parameters for the data markers.
children.desTs: 设置数据标记的参数。

children.des: Sets the format and precision of the data numbersdisplayed on the x- and y-axis.
children.desTs: 设置x轴和y轴上显示的数据号的格式和精度。

children.des: Enables you to write the xy plot values to a file.
children.desTs: 使您能够将XY图值写入文件。

children.des: Sets the visibility, line weight and color of themajor and minor rules in the x- and y-axis directions.
children.desTs: 设置x轴和y轴方向上主要规则和次要规则的可见性、线粗和颜色。

children.des: Contains commands that enable you to customize therelative positions of sub-windows inside the active graphics window.
children.desTs: 包含使您能够自定义活动图形窗口内子窗口的相对位置的命令。

children.des: Draws a border around the sub-window.
children.desTs: 在子窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the sub-window.
children.desTs: 设置子窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the sub-window.
children.desTs: 设置子窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the sub-window.
children.desTs: 设置子窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the sub-window.
children.desTs: 设置子窗口的上边界。

children.des: Sets the visibility of the sub-window.
children.desTs: 设置子窗口的可见性。

children.des: Enables/disables whether the y-coordinate should bescaled to show a percent of total values being plotted.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用y坐标是否应按比例缩放以显示正在绘制的总值的百分比。

contents.des: Contains commands for displaying zones.
contents.desTs: 包含用于显示区域的命令。

children.des: Displays the zones that are in the neighborhood of the selected zones. The neighboring zones                have to be in contact, or intersecting the selected zone.
children.desTs: 显示所选区域附近的区域。邻近区域必须与所选区域接触或相交。

children.des: Displays the zones with similar area to the selected zone area.
children.desTs: 显示与选定区域面积相似的区域。

children.des: Hidesthe selected zones in the display.
children.desTs: 在显示屏中隐藏选定的区域。

children.des: Displays only the selected zones.
children.desTs: 仅显示选定的分区。

children.des: Makes the geometry transparent so that internal zones are visible.This command works as a toggle undoing the transparency of the previouslyselected zones.
children.desTs: 使几何图形透明，以便内部区域可见。此命令用作取消之前选定区域透明度的切换。

children.des: Selects all the visible zones in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 删除图形窗口中的所有可见区域。

children.des: Unhidesall the zones in the geometry and displays them.
children.desTs: 取消隐藏几何体中的所有区域并显示它们。

children.des: Toggles the colors of the geometry. In one mode geometry is coloredobject-wise while in the other mode it is colored zone-wise.
children.desTs: 切换几何图形的颜色。在一种模式中，几何图形是按颜色对象绘制的，而在另一种模式中，几何图形是按区域绘制的。

children.des: Toggles the color palette of the geometry.
children.desTs: 切换几何体的调色板。

list.des: commands used to control the rendering of your    model and mesh in the graphical window.
list.desTs: 用于控制图形窗口中模型和网格的渲染的命令。

contents.des: Exits the program.
contents.desTs: 退出程序。

list.des: the command to close the program.

contents.des: Enables you to append the mesh files. This command is available only after a mesh file has          been read in.
contents.desTs: 使您能够附加网格文件。此命令仅在读取网格文件后才可用。

contents.des: Enables you to append the mesh files using the tmerge utility. This command is available only after amesh file has been read in.
contents.desTs: 使您能够使用tmerge实用程序附加网格文件。此命令仅在读取amesh文件后才可用。

contents.des: Answering yes will set the Common Fluids Format (CFF) as the          default file format for reading and writing case/data files.
contents.desTs: 回答“是”将通用流体格式（CFF）设置为读取和写入案例/数据文件的默认文件格式。

contents.des: Controls whether attempts to overwrite existing filesrequire confirmation.
contents.desTs: 控制尝试覆盖现有文件是否需要确认。

contents.des: Enables/disables the writing of binary files.
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用二进制文件的写入。

contents.des: Lists the names of the converters that are used tochange foreign mesh (while importing mesh files from third-party packages)files.
contents.desTs: 列出用于更改外部网格（同时从第三方包导入网格文件）文件的转换器的名称。

contents.des: Enables you to change the extension (such as .cas,.msh, .neu) and arguments used with a specified filter.
contents.desTs: 允许您更改指定筛选器使用的扩展名（如.cas、.msh、.neu）和参数。

contents.des: Enables you to import mesh information generated bysome CAD packages (Ansys, I-deas, NASTRAN, PATRAN, and HYPERMESH),as well as mesh information in the CGNS (CFD general notation system)format.
contents.desTs: 使您能够导入某些CAD包（Ansys、I-deas、NASTRAN、PATRAN和HyperMESH）生成的网格信息，以及CGNS（CFA通用符号系统）格式的网格信息。

children.des: Enables you to read a Ansys surface mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取Ansys表面网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a Ansys volume mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取Ansys卷网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to import CAD files based on the options set.
children.desTs: 使您能够根据选项集导入CAD文件。

children.des: Enables you to import CAD files based on the options set.
children.desTs: 使您能够根据选项集导入CAD文件。

children.des: Contains additional options for importing CAD files.
children.desTs: 包含用于导入CAD文件的其他选项。

children.des: Enables you to continue the import of the CAD file(s),despite errors or problems creating the faceting on certain surfaces,or other issues. This option is disabled by default.
children.desTs: 使您能够继续导入CAD文件，尽管在某些表面上创建刻面时出现错误或问题或其他问题。默认情况下，此选项处于禁用状态。

children.des: Enables creating the CAD Assemblies tree on CAD import. The CADAssemblies tree represents the CAD tree as it is presented in the CAD package in which it wascreated. All sub-assembly levels from the CAD are maintained on import in Fluent Meshing.
children.desTs: 允许在CAD导入时创建CAD装配树。CADAssemblies树表示CAD树，因为它在创建它的CAD包中显示。在Fluent Meshing中导入时，将维护CAD中的所有子装配级别。

children.des: Enables zones without Named Selections to inherit the object name on import. This           option is disabled by default.
children.desTs: 使不具有命名选择的区域能够在导入时继承对象名称。默认情况下禁用此选项。

children.des: Adds the specified label to the name of double-connectedface zones (face zones shared by two bodies).
children.desTs: 将指定的标签添加到双连接面区域（两个实体共享的面区域）的名称中。

children.des: Enables processing of enclosure and symmetry namedselections during import. This option is disabled by default. Thisoption is applicable only to Ansys DesignModeler (*.agdb) files.
children.desTs: 启用在导入期间处理封闭和对称名称选择。默认情况下禁用此选项。此选项仅适用于Ansys DesignModel（*.agDB）文件。

children.des: Enables feature extraction from the CAD model on import. You can choose to disable this, ifdesired. Specify an appropriate value for feature angle. The default value is 40.
children.desTs: 在导入时启用从CAD模型中提取特征。如果需要，可以选择禁用此功能。为特征角度指定适当的值。默认值为40。

children.des: Enables import of Body names from the CAD files. Thisoption is enabled by default.
children.desTs: 启用从CAD文件导入车身名称。默认情况下启用此选项。

children.des: Enables importing of the curvature data from the nodes of the CAD facets. You can choose todisable this, if desired.
children.desTs: 启用从CAD面的节点导入弯曲数据。如果需要，您可以选择禁用该功能。

children.des: Enables import of Part names from the CAD file(s).This option is enabled by default.
children.desTs: 启用从CAD文件导入零件名称。默认情况下启用此选项。

children.des: Enables the merging of geometry object nodes duringCAD import. This option is enabled by default.
children.desTs: 在CAD导入过程中启用几何对象节点的合并。默认情况下启用此选项。

children.des: Enables you to modify all duplicate object/zone names by adding incremental integers           as suffix. This option is disabled by default.
children.desTs: 使您能够通过添加增量integer作为后缀来修改所有重复的对象/区域名称。默认情况下禁用此选项。

children.des: Allows you to specify the character used between name fields. Default is ':'.
children.desTs: 允许您指定名称字段之间使用的字符。默认值为“：”。

children.des: Enables you to import Named Selections from the CAD file(s), including Named Selections from Ansys DesignModeler,publications from CATIA, and so on. You can additionally chooseto ignore import of certain Named Selections based on the patternspecified (for example, Layer* to ignorelayer Named Selections from CATIA), or by specifying multiplewild cards (for example, ^(Color|Layer|Material).* to remove color, layer, and material Named Selections from CATIA).
children.desTs: 使您能够从CAD文件中导入命名选择，包括来自Ansys DesignModel的命名选择、来自Illustrator的发布等。您还可以根据指定的模式忽略某些命名选择的导入（例如，Layer* 到MIDI relater的命名选择），或通过指定多个百搭卡（例如，'（Color）|层|材料）。*删除颜色、层和材质来自CMA的“命名选择”）。

children.des: Enables the setting of object type on import. Theoptions available are auto, geometry, and mesh. The default setting is auto based on the tessellation method selected: geometryobjects will be created when the cad-faceting  method is used, while mesh objects will be created when the cfd-surface-mesh method is used.
children.desTs: 启用导入时设置对象类型。可用的选项包括自动、几何和网格。默认设置是根据所选的镶嵌方法自动：使用cad-faceting方法时将创建几何对象，而使用cfd-Surface-mesh方法时将创建网格对象。

children.des: Enables you to create one face zone per body/face/objectto be imported.
children.desTs: 使您能够为每个要导入的身体/面部/对象创建一个面部区域。

children.des: Enables you to create one object per body/part/file/selection to be                      imported. The default program-controlled option                      allows the software to make the appropriate choice. This option makes a choice                      between per body and per part based on whether shared topology is off or on,                      respectively.
children.desTs: 使您能够为每个要导入的实体/零件/文件/选择创建一个对象。默认的程序控制选项允许软件做出适当的选择。此选项分别根据共享布局是关闭还是打开，在每个实体和每个零件之间进行选择。

children.des: When enabled, all files in the specified directoryas well as in its subdirectories will be imported. This option isdisabled by default.
children.desTs: 启用后，指定目录及其子目录中的所有文件都将被导入。默认情况下，该选项处于禁用状态。

children.des: Saves a PMDB (*.pmdb) file in the directory containingthe CAD files imported. You can use this file to import the same CADfile(s) again with different options set, for a quicker import thanthe full import. This option is disabled by default.
children.desTs: 在包含导入的CAD文件的目录中复制一个MDB（*.pmDB）文件。您可以使用此文件通过设置不同的选项再次导入相同的CAD文件，以便比完全导入更快地导入。默认情况下禁用此选项。

children.des: Enables separation of feature edges based on angle,connectivity, and named selections on import. Edge zone names willhave suitable suffixes depending on separation criteria, order ofzones, existing zone names and other import options selected.
children.desTs: 基于导入时的角度、连通性和命名选择启用特征边的分离。边区域名称将具有合适的后缀，具体取决于分离标准、区域顺序、现有区域名称和其他选定的导入选项。

children.des: Adds the specified label to the name of single-connectededge zones (edge zones referenced by a single face).
children.desTs: 将指定的标签添加到单连接边缘区域（由单个面引用的边缘区域）的名称中。

children.des: Removes the extension of the CAD files from the object/face zone names on import.           This option is disabled by default.
children.desTs: 在导入时从对象/面区域名称中删除CAD文件的扩展名。默认情况下禁用此选项。

children.des: Enables you to remove the path prefix from the object/face zone names on import. The defaultsetting is auto which removes the path prefix from object/face zone nameswhen the object creation granularity is set to one object per file. You can also explicitly selectyes or no.
children.desTs: 使您能够在导入时从对象/面区域名称中删除路径前置。默认设置为自动，当对象创建粒度设置为每个文件一个对象时，它会从对象/面区域名称中删除路径前置。您还可以显式选择或否。

children.des: Enables you to control the tessellation (faceting)during file import. You can select either cad-faceting or cfd-surface-mesh.
children.desTs: 允许您在文件导入期间控制镶嵌（小面）。您可以选择cad-小面或cfd-曲面-网格。

children.des: Enables you to use the Named Selections for the object/zonenames on import. Select auto, no, or yes. The default selectionis auto where the Named Selection will beused as the object/zone name, except when the object creation granularityis set to one object per file.
children.desTs: 使您能够在导入时使用对象/区域名称的命名选择。选择自动、否或是。默认选择为自动，其中命名选择将用作对象/区域名称，除非对象创建粒度设置为每个文件一个对象。

children.des: Enables you to add the component (part or assembly) names to the           object/zone names on import. Select auto,            no, or yes. The default selection is            auto where the component name will be added to the object/zone           name.
children.desTs: 使您能够在导入时将零部件（零件或组件）名称添加到对象/区域名称中。选择“自动”、“否”或“是”。默认选择是“自动”，其中零部件名称将添加到对象/区域名称中。

children.des: Enables you to choose whether to add the part names from the CAD file to the object and zonenames on import. The default setting is auto which adds the part names toboth object and zone names when object creation granularity is set to body.When the object creation granularity is set to part orfile, the part names are not added to the zone names, face zone labels, or theregion names, by default. You can also explicitly select yes orno.
children.desTs: 使您可以选择是否在导入时将CAD文件中的部件名称添加到对象和区域名称中。默认设置为自动，当对象创建粒度设置为主体时，它将部件名称添加到对象和区域名称中。当对象创建粒度设置为部件或文件时，默认情况下，部件名称不会添加到区域名称、面区域标签或区域名称中。您也可以显式选择是或否。

children.des: Enables you to modify zone names by using part or body names as suffixes to the           Named Selections spanning multiple parts/bodies. This option is enabled by default.
children.desTs: 使您能够通过使用零件或主体名称作为跨越多个零件/主体的命名选择的后缀来修改区域名称。默认情况下启用此选项。

children.des: Enables you to read a CGNS surface mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取CGNS表面网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a CGNS volume mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取CGNS体积网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a Fluent UNS V2 case file.
children.desTs: 使您能够阅读Fluent UNS V2案例文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a 2D mesh into the 3D version.
children.desTs: 使您能够将2D网格读取到3D版本中。

children.des: Enables you to read a GAMBIT surface mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取GAMBIT表面网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a GAMBIT volume mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取GAMBIT体积网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a HYPERMESH surface mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取HyperMESH表面网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a HYPERMESH volume mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取HyperMESH体积网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a NASTRAN surface mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取NASTRAN表面网格文件。

children.des: Enables you to read a NASTRAN volume mesh file.
children.desTs: 使您能够读取NASTRAN体积网格文件。

contents.des: Loads the Ansys ACT tool.
contents.desTs: 加载Ansys ACT工具。

contents.des: Enables you to read a boundary mesh. If the boundarymesh is contained in two or more separate files, you can read themin together and assemble the complete boundary mesh.
contents.desTs: 使您能够读取边界网格。如果边界网格包含在两个或多个单独的文件中，则您可以一起读取它们并组装完整的边界网格。

contents.des: Enables you to read the mesh contained in a case file.
contents.desTs: 使您能够读取案例文件中包含的网格。

contents.des: Enables you to read domain files.
contents.desTs: 使您能够读取域文件。

contents.des: Enables you to read a journal file into the program.
contents.desTs: 允许您将日记文件读入程序。

contents.des: Enables you to read a mesh file. You can also usethis command to read a Fluent mesh file created with GAMBIT, orto read the mesh available in a Fluent case file.
contents.desTs: 使您能够读取网格文件。您还可以使用此命令读取使用GAMBIT创建的Fluent网格文件，或者读取Fluent案例文件中可用的网格。

contents.des: Uses the tmerge utility to readthe mesh contained in two or more separate files. It enables you toread the mesh files together and helps assemble the complete mesh.
contents.desTs: 使用tmerge工具读取包含在两个或多个单独文件中的网格。它使您能够一起读取网格文件并帮助组装完整的网格。

contents.des: Enables you to read multiple boundary mesh files intothe meshing mode.
contents.desTs: 使您能够将多个边界网格文件读取到网格模式中。

contents.des: Enables you to read in two or more files togetherand have the complete mesh assembled for you, if the mesh files arecontained in two or more separate files.
contents.desTs: 如果网格文件包含在两个或多个单独的文件中，则使您能够一起读取两个或多个文件并为您组装完整的网格。

contents.des: Enables you to set the following options for readingmesh files:
contents.desTs: 使您能够为读取网格文件设置以下选项：

contents.des: Enables you to read in a size field file.
contents.desTs: 使您能够读取大小字段文件。

contents.des: Allows you to set an idle timeout so that an idle Ansys Fluent session will automatically      save and close after the specified time.
contents.desTs: 允许您设置空闲超时，以便空闲的Ansys Fluent会话将在指定时间后自动保存和关闭。

contents.des: Allows you to improve backwards compatibility for journal files. This command hides          any new TUI prompts that are added at a future release of Ansys Fluent and reverts to the          arguments of the release that you specify using the command (within two full releases of          the current release). The command is automatically added to a journal file as soon as you          start the recording. See Creating and Reading Journal Files for          details.
contents.desTs: 允许您改进日记文件的向后兼容性。此命令隐藏在Ansys Fluent的未来版本中添加的任何新TUI提示，并恢复到您使用该命令指定的版本参数（在当前版本的两个完整版本内）。一旦开始录制，该命令就会自动添加到日记文件中。有关详细信息，请参阅创建和读取日记文件。

contents.des: Displays the current release and version information.
contents.desTs: 显示当前发布和版本信息。

contents.des: Starts recording all input and writes itto a file. The current Fluent version is automatically recorded in the journal file. Note thatcommands entered using paths from older versions of Fluent will be upgraded to their current pathin the journal file. See Creating and Reading Journal Files in the Fluent User's Guide.
contents.desTs: 开始记录所有输入并将其写入文件。当前Fluent版本会自动记录在日志文件中。请注意，使用旧版本Fluent的路径输入的命令将升级到日志文件中的当前路径。请参阅Fluent用户指南中的创建和读取日志文件。

contents.des: Starts recording input and output in a file.
contents.desTs: 开始在文件中记录输入和输出。

contents.des: Stops recording input and closes the journal file.
contents.desTs: 停止记录输入并关闭日记文件。

contents.des: Stops recording input and output, and closes the transcriptfile.
contents.desTs: 停止记录输入和输出，并关闭转录文件。

contents.des: Enables you to write the specified boundaries intoa mesh file.
contents.desTs: 使您能够将指定的边界写入网格文件。

contents.des: Enables you to write a case file that can be readby Fluent.
contents.desTs: 允许您编写Fluent可以读取的案例文件。

contents.des: Enables you to write all the mesh domains (exceptglobal) into a file that can be read.
contents.desTs: 使您能够将所有网格域（global除外）写入可读取的文件。

contents.des: Enables you to write a mesh file.
contents.desTs: 使您能够编写网格文件。

contents.des: Allows you to enable or disable the enforce mesh topology option for writing mesh/case          files.
contents.desTs: 允许您启用或禁用用于写入网格/案例文件的强制网格布局选项。

contents.des: Enables you to write a size field file.
contents.desTs: 使您能够编写大小字段文件。

list.des: commands used to input and output your    data.
list.desTs: 用于输入和输出数据的命令。

contents.des: Enables the definition of a material point. Specify thefluid zone name and the location to define the material point.
contents.desTs: 启用物质点的定义。指定流体区名称和定义物质点的位置。

contents.des: Enables the deletion of all defined material points.
contents.desTs: 允许删除所有定义的材质点。

contents.des: Deletes the specified material point.
contents.desTs: 初始化指定的材料点。

contents.des: Lists all the defined material points.
contents.desTs: 列出所有定义的材料点。

list.des: commands used to manage material points in your    model.
list.desTs: 用于管理模型中的材料点的命令。

contents.des: Enables you to generate the volume mesh automatically. Specify a mesh object name for     object-based auto mesh; if no name is given, face zone based auto mesh is performed. Specify     the mesh elements to be used when prompted. Specify whether to merge the cells into a single     zone or keep the cell zones separate. For face zone based meshing, specify whether     automatically identify the domain to be meshed based on the topology information.
contents.desTs: 使您能够自动生成体积网格。为基于对象的自动网格指定网格对象名称;如果没有给出名称，则执行基于面区域的自动网格。在出现提示时指定要使用的网格元素。指定是将单元合并到单个区域中还是保持单元区域分开。对于基于面区域的网格化，指定是否根据布局信息自动识别要网格化的域。

contents.des: Enters the auto-mesh-controls submenu
contents.desTs: 进入自动网格控制按钮

children.des: Enables creation of a backup of the surface mesh before volume meshing starts. This        option is enabled by default.
children.desTs: 允许在体积网格化开始之前创建曲面网格的备份。默认情况下启用此选项。

contents.des: Enables you to specify a prefix for cell zones created during the auto mesh procedure.
contents.desTs: 使您能够为自动网格程序期间创建的单元区域指定一个前置字。

contents.des: Enters the cavity menu.
contents.desTs: 进入空腔菜单。

children.des: Enables you to create a cavity for adding new zones to the existing volume mesh.
children.desTs: 使您能够创建空腔以将新区域添加到现有体积网格。

children.des: Enables you to merge the specified cavity domain with the parent domain.
children.desTs: 使您能够将指定的空腔域与父域合并。

children.des: Enables you to create a cavity to modify the existing volume mesh in the specified        region.
children.desTs: 使您能够创建空腔以修改指定区域中的现有体积网格。

children.des: Enables you to create a cavity for removing zones from the existing volume mesh.
children.desTs: 使您能够创建空腔以从现有体积网格中删除区域。

children.des: Enables you to create a cavity for removing a set of zones from an existing volume mesh        and replacing them with new set of zones.
children.desTs: 使您能够创建一个空腔，用于从现有体积网格中删除一组区域并用新区域替换它们。

contents.des: Contains options for copying or clearing cell zone conditions when a case file is     read.
contents.desTs: 包含读取案例文件时复制或清除单元区条件的选项。

children.des: Clears the cell zone conditions assigned to the specified zones.
children.desTs: 清除分配给指定区域的单元格区域条件。

children.des: Clears the cell conditions assigned to all the zones.
children.desTs: 清除分配给所有区域的单元格条件。

children.des: Enables you to copy the cell zone conditions from the zone selected to the zones        specified.
children.desTs: 使您能够将单元区条件从选定的区复制到指定的区。

contents.des: Checks for topological errors. Note that this command will check both mesh and geometry     zones. Generally, errors in geometry zones will not cause issues in the solver. Use      mesh/selective-mesh-check in order to check only mesh zones.
contents.desTs: 检查是否存在布局错误。请注意，此命令将检查网格和几何区域。通常，几何区域中的错误不会在求解器中引起问题。使用网格/选择网格检查仅检查网格区域。

contents.des: Enables you to ensure that the mesh quality is appropriate before transferring the mesh to     the solution mode.
contents.desTs: 使您能够在将网格转移到解决方案模式之前确保网格质量适当。

contents.des: Enables you to report additional quality metrics when set to 1.
contents.desTs: 设置为1时，使您能够报告其他质量指标。

contents.des: Enables you to generate a new mesh by deleting the internal mesh and leaving only the     boundary faces and nodes.
contents.desTs: 使您能够通过删除内部网格并仅保留边界面和节点来生成新网格。

contents.des: Creates the heat exchanger mesh. You need to specify the method for     selecting the Location coordinates (by Position or Nodes), the location coordinates, the     parameters for setting up mesh density (by Interval or Size), and the number of intervals     (sizes) between points (nodes) 1–2, 1–3, 1–4. Also specify the object/zone     name prefix and enable creating the mesh object, if required.
contents.desTs: 创建热交换器网格。您需要指定选择位置坐标（按位置或节点）的方法、位置坐标、设置网格密度的参数（按间隔或大小）以及点（节点）之间的间隔（大小）数量1- 2、1 - 3、1 - 4。如果需要，还可以指定对象/区域名称前置并启用创建网格对象。

contents.des: Enters the domain menu.
contents.desTs: 进入域菜单。

children.des: Activates the specified domain for meshing or reporting operations.
children.desTs: 激活指定的域以进行网格化或报告操作。

children.des: Creates a new domain based on the specified boundary face zones. Ensure valid boundary        zones are specified; specifying invalid zones will generate an error.
children.desTs: 基于指定的边界面区域创建新域。确保指定有效的边界区域;指定无效区域将生成错误。

children.des: Creates a new domain based on the specified cell zone.
children.desTs: 基于指定的单元区域创建新域。

children.des: Creates a new domain based on the specified
children.desTs: 根据指定的创建新域

children.des: Deletes the specified domain.
children.desTs: 验证指定的域。

children.des: Displays the boundary face zones of the specified domain.
children.desTs: 显示指定域的边界面区域。

children.des: Prints the information for the specified domain.
children.desTs: 打印指定域的信息。

contents.des: Enters the hexcore menu.
contents.desTs: 进入六角核菜单。

children.des: Enters the hexcore controls menu.
children.desTs: 进入六边形控制菜单。

children.des: Determines the types of cells (large cells, small cells, or both) that are going to           be replaced with pyramid and tet cells in order to avoid any 1:8 cell jumps in the           hexcore region. The default is no and            small-cells.
children.desTs: 确定将被金字塔和tet单元替换的单元格类型（大单元格、小单元格或两者兼而有之），以避免十六核区域中的任何1：8单元格跳跃。默认值为no和small-单元格。

children.des: Sets the number of addition cells to mark for subdivision.
children.desTs: 设置要标记用于细分的添加单元格的数量。

children.des: Computes the maximum cell length for the hexcore mesh.
children.desTs: 计算六边形核心网格的最大单元长度。

children.des: Enables you to extend the hexcore mesh to specified domain extents and/or selected           planar boundaries. When enabled, the outer-domain-params           sub-menu will be available.
children.desTs: 允许您将六边形网格扩展到指定的域范围和/或选定的平面边界。启用后，外部域参数子菜单将可用。

children.des: Toggles the automatic deleting of the dead zones.
children.desTs: 切换自动删除死区。

children.des: Sets the maximum cell length for the hex cells in the domain.
children.desTs: 设置域中十六进制单元的最大单元长度。

children.des: Specifies the maximum number of cells in the initial Cartesian mesh.
children.desTs: 指定初始Cartesian网格中的最大单元数。

children.des: Selects the default non-fluid cell zone type. After the mesh is initialized, any           non-fluid zones will be set to this type. If the mesh includes multiple regions (for           example, the problem for which you are creating the mesh includes a fluid zone and one or           more solid zones), and you plan to refine all of them using the same refinement           parameters, modify the Non-Fluid Typebefore generating the hexcore mesh.
children.desTs: 初始化默认的非流体单元区域类型。初始化网格后，任何非流体区域都将设置为此类型。如果网格包括多个区域（例如，创建网格的问题包括一个流体区域和一个或多个实体区域），并且您计划使用相同的细化参数细化所有区域，请在生成六角核网格之前修改非流体类型。

children.des: Speeds up hexahedral core generation by enabling the octree technique for hexcore           mesh generation. This option is disabled by default.
children.desTs: 通过启用八叉树技术来生成六边形核心，加快六边形核心的生成速度。默认情况下，该选项处于禁用状态。

children.des: Contains options for defining the outer domain parameters. This sub-menu is           available only when define-hexcore-extents? is enabled.
children.desTs: 包含定义外部域参数的选项。此子菜单仅在define-hexcore-extensions时可用？已启用。

children.des: Enables you to specify the extents of the hexcore outer box using the               coordinates command.
children.desTs: 使您可以使用coordinates命令指定六角外框的范围。

children.des: Specifies the extents (min and max coordinates) of the hexcore outer box. This              command is available when the specify-coordinates? option is              enabled.
children.desTs: 指定六边形外盒的范围（最小和最大坐标）。当指定坐标？时，此命令可用选项已启用。

children.des: Enables you to specify selected boundaries to which the hexcore mesh is to be              generated using the boundaries command.
children.desTs: 使您能够指定使用边界命令生成六角核网格的选定边界。

children.des: Specifies the boundaries to which the hexcore mesh is to be generated when the               specify-boundaries? option is enabled. After specifying the              boundaries, the auto-align?,               delete-old-face-zones?, and list              options will also be available.
children.desTs: 指定当特定边界时生成六角核网格的边界？选项已启用。指定边界后，自动对齐？，删除旧面孔区？，并且列表选项也可用。

children.des: Enables you to axis-align non-aligned planar boundaries to which hexcore mesh is              to be generated. This option is available only when the               specify-boundaries? option is enabled and the boundaries are              specified.
children.desTs: 使您能够轴对齐要生成六角核网格的非对齐平面边界。此选项仅在特定边界时可用？选项已启用并指定边界。

children.des: Specifies the tolerance for aligning boundary zones when               auto-align? is enabled.
children.desTs: 指定自动对齐时对齐边界区的容差？已启用。

children.des: Aligns the boundary zones specified (using the               boundaries command) with the tolerance specified \ (using              the auto-align-tolerance command) when               auto-align? is enabled.
children.desTs: 自动对齐时，是否将指定的边界区域（使用boundaries命令）与指定的容差对齐\（使用auto-align-tolerance命令）？已启用。

children.des: Enables you to delete the original tri face zones that have been replaced during              the hexcore meshing process. This option is available only when the               specify-boundaries? option is enabled and the boundaries are              specified.
children.desTs: 使您能够删除在六角核网格化过程中被替换的原始三面区域。此选项仅在特定边界时可用？选项已启用并指定边界。

children.des: Lists the boundaries to which the hexcore mesh is to be generated. This option is              available only when the specify-boundaries? option is enabled              and the boundaries are specified.
children.desTs: 列出要生成六角核网格的边界。此选项仅在特定边界时可用？选项已启用并指定边界。

children.des: Specifies the distance for the hexcore interface to peel-back from the boundary. The           default value is 0. The higher the value of peel layer, the bigger the distance between           the hexcore interface and the boundary.
children.desTs: 指定六角核界面与边界剥离的距离。默认值为0。剥离层的值越高，六角核界面与边界之间的距离越大。

children.des: Displays local sizing settings (max cell length and growth rate) for specified           region(s).
children.desTs: 显示指定区域的本地大小设置（最大单元长度和生长率）。

children.des: Allows you to specify local sizing settings (max cell length and growth rate)  for           specified region(s).
children.desTs: 允许您指定指定区域的本地大小设置（最大单元长度和生长率）。

children.des: Enables you to omit the tetrahedral refinement phase for reducing total cell count           (default is no). Hex cell count is unaffected.
children.desTs: 使您可以省略四面体细化阶段以减少总单元计数（默认为否）。十六进制单元计数不受影响。

children.des: Enables you to create the hexcore mesh according to the specified parameters.
children.desTs: 允许您根据指定的参数创建六角网格。

children.des: Enters the hexcore local refinement region sub-menu.
children.desTs: 进入六边形局部细化区域子菜单。

children.des: Enables you to activate the specified local regions for refinement.
children.desTs: 使您能够激活指定的本地区域进行优化。

children.des: Enables you to deactivate the specified local regions for refinement.
children.desTs: 使您能够停用指定的本地区域以进行优化。

children.des: Defines the local region according to the specified parameters.
children.desTs: 根据指定的参数定义本地区域。

children.des: Deletes the specified refinement region.
children.desTs: 初始化指定的细化区域。

children.des: Reports the ideal hex volume for the given edge length.
children.desTs: 报告给定边长的理想十六进制体积。

children.des: Creates a default region encompassing the entire geometry.
children.desTs: 创建包含整个几何图形的默认区域。

children.des: Lists the defined and active regions in the console.
children.desTs: 列出控制台中定义的和活动的区域。

children.des: Enables the merge-tets-to-pyramids command to reduce the total        cell count.
children.desTs: 启用merge-tets-to-pyramples命令以减少总单元数。

contents.des: Applies a Laplacian smoothing operator to the mesh nodes. This command can be used for     smoothing of all cell types, including prismatic cells.
contents.desTs: 将拉普拉斯平滑运算符复制到网格节点。此命令可用于平滑所有单元类型，包括方形单元。

contents.des: Shows all mesh parameters.
contents.desTs: 显示所有网格参数。

contents.des: Enters the manage cell zones menu.
contents.desTs: 进入管理单元区域菜单。

children.des: Lists all active zones.
children.desTs: 列出所有活动区域。

children.des: Lists all face zones that refer to the specified cell zone.
children.desTs: 列出引用指定单元格区域的所有面区域。

children.des: Sets the active zones based on points that are defined in an external file. For each        zone you want to activate, you need to specify the coordinates of a point in the zone, the        zone type (for example, fluid), and (optionally) a new name. A sample file is shown below:
children.desTs: 根据外部文件中定义的点设置活动区域。对于要激活的每个区域，您需要指定区域中点的坐标、区域类型（例如，流体）和（可选）新名称。示例文件如下所示：

children.des: Enables you to change the prefix for the cell zone.
children.desTs: 使您能够更改单元格区域的前置码。

children.des: Copies all nodes and faces of specified cell zones.
children.desTs: 复制指定单元区的所有节点和面。

children.des: Deletes a cell zone, along with its associated nodes and faces. When deleting cell        zones that contain poly cells, you will be warned that the original mesh must be deleted and        the original faces restored prior to remeshing the volumetric region.
children.desTs: 初始化单元区域及其关联的节点和面。删除包含多边形单元的单元区域时，您将收到警告，必须删除原始网格并恢复原始面，然后才能重新网格化体积区域。

children.des: Prints the coordinates of the material point for the specified cell zone.
children.desTs: 打印指定单元区域的材料点的坐标。

children.des: Specifies a new cell zone ID. If a conflict is detected, the change will be        ignored.
children.desTs: 指定新的单元区域ID。如果检测到冲突，则将忽略更改。

children.des: Prints information on all cell zones.
children.desTs: 打印所有单元区的信息。

children.des: Merges two or more cell zones.
children.desTs: 合并两个或多个单元格区域。

children.des: Enables you to merge dead zones having a cell count lower than the specified threshold        value, with the adjacent cell zone. The result of the merge operation is determined by the        type of the adjacent cell zone and the shared face area. The priority for merging with the        adjacent cell zone based on type is fluid > solid > dead (that is, merging with an        adjacent fluid zone takes priority over merging with an adjacent solid zone, which in turn        takes priority over merging with a dead zone). Also, if the adjacent zones are of the same        type (for example, fluid), the zone will be merged with the zone having the largest shared        face area.
children.desTs: 使您能够将像元计数低于指定阈值的死区与相邻像元区域合并。合并操作的结果由相邻像元区域和共享面区域的类型确定。根据类型与相邻像元区域合并的优先级为流体>实体>死（即，与邻近的流体区合并优先于与邻近的实体区合并，而邻近的实体区则优先于与死区合并）。此外，如果邻近的区域是相同类型的（例如，流体），则该区域将与具有最大共享面部区域的区域合并。

children.des: Enables you to rename a cell zone.
children.desTs: 使您能够重命名单元格区域。

children.des: Specifies a new origin for the mesh, to be used for cell zone rotation. The default        origin is (0,0,0).
children.desTs: 指定网格的新原点，用于单元区旋转。默认原点为（0，0，0）。

children.des: Generates cells by revolving a face thread.
children.desTs: 通过旋转面线程生成单元。

children.des: Rotates all nodes of specified cell zones by a specified angle.
children.desTs: 将指定单元区域的所有节点旋转指定角度。

children.des: Rotates all nodes of the model by a specified angle.
children.desTs: 按指定角度旋转模型的所有节点。

children.des: Scales all nodes of specified cell zones by a specified factor.
children.desTs: 按指定因子缩放指定单元区的所有节点。

children.des: Scales all nodes of the model by a specified factor.
children.desTs: 按指定因子缩放模型的所有节点。

children.des: Sets the specified cell zones to be active.
children.desTs: 将指定的单元区域设置为活动状态。

children.des: Translates all nodes of specified cell zones by a specified vector.
children.desTs: 通过指定的载体转换指定单元区的所有节点。

children.des: Translates all nodes of the model by a specified vector.
children.desTs: 将模型的所有节点转换为指定的载体。

children.des: Changes the type and name of a cell zone.
children.desTs: 更改单元格区域的类型和名称。

contents.des: Enters the mesh modify menu.
contents.desTs: 进入网格修改菜单。

children.des: Enables you to improve face warp by node movement. Specify the appropriate cell zones        and boundary zones, the maximum warp, the number of iterations per face to be improved, and        the number of iterations of the automatic node movement procedure (default, 4).
children.desTs: 使您可以通过节点移动改进面扭曲。指定适当的单元区域和边界区域、最大扭曲、要改进的每个面的迭代次数以及自动节点移动过程的迭代次数（默认值为4）。

children.des: Enables you to improve the mesh quality by node movement. Specify the appropriate cell        zones and boundary zones, the quality limit based on the quality measure selected, dihedral        angle, the number of iterations per node to be moved and the number of iterations of the        automatic node movement procedure (default, 1). You can also choose to restrict the movement        of boundary nodes along the surface.
children.desTs: 使您能够通过节点移动来提高网格质量。指定适当的单元区域和边界区域、基于所选质量测量的质量限制、二面角、要移动的每个节点的迭代次数以及自动节点移动程序的迭代次数（默认，1）。您还可以选择限制边界节点沿着表面的移动。

children.des: Clears all items from the selection list.
children.desTs: 从选择列表中清除所有项目。

children.des: Deselects the last item you selected using the select-entity        command.
children.desTs: 取消选择使用select-entry命令选择的最后一个项目。

children.des: Places all unused nodes in a separate interior node zone.
children.desTs: 将所有未使用的节点放置在单独的内部节点区域中。

children.des: Lists all items in the selection list.
children.desTs: 列出选择列表中的所有项目。

children.des: Lists cells with skewness in a specified range.
children.desTs: 列出具有指定范围内倾斜度的单元格。

children.des: Attempts to introduce a new node into the existing mesh.
children.desTs: 尝试将新节点引入现有网格中。

children.des: Inserts nodes associated with node or face zone into the volume mesh.
children.desTs: 将与节点或面区域关联的节点复制到体积网格中。

children.des: Reports the maximum skewness of cells using the specified node.
children.desTs: 使用指定节点报告单元格的最大偏度。

children.des: Attempts to refine the cells in the probe list by introducing a node nears its        centroid. This technique is useful for removing very flat cells near the boundary when        boundary sliver removal is not possible. After refining the cell, you should smooth the        mesh.
children.desTs: 尝试通过引入靠近其重心的节点来细化探测列表中的单元。当无法去除边界条时，此技术对于删除边界附近非常平坦的单元非常有用。细化单元后，您应该平滑网格。

children.des: Repairs negative volume cells by moving nodes. Specify the appropriate boundary zones,        the number of iterations per node to be moved, dihedral angle, whether to restrict the        movement of boundary nodes along the surface, and the number of iterations of the automatic        node movement procedure (default, 1).
children.desTs: 通过移动节点修复负体积单元。指定适当的边界区域、要移动的每个节点的迭代次数、二面角、是否限制边界节点沿着表面的移动以及自动节点移动过程的迭代次数（默认值，1）。

children.des: Adds an entity (face, node, cell, etc.) to the selection list.
children.desTs: 添加实体（面、节点、单元等）到选择列表。

children.des: Applies Laplace smoothing to the nodes in the selection list.
children.desTs: 对选择列表中的节点进行拉普拉斯平滑。

contents.des: Enters the non-conformals menu.
contents.desTs: 进入非一致菜单。

children.des: Enters the non-conformals controls menu.
children.desTs: 进入不合格品控制菜单。

children.des: Toggles the creation of a non-conformal interface.
children.desTs: 切换非保形界面的创建。

children.des: Specifies the method to be used for retriangulating the quad faces on the           non-conformal zones.
children.desTs: 指定用于在非保形区域上重新调整四元面的方法。

children.des: Remeshes the prism-side quad zones named prism-side* or               *-quad*.
children.desTs: 重新整理名为prism-side* 或 *-quad* 的棱镜侧四方区。

children.des: Splits the quad faces diagonally into tri faces.
children.desTs: 将四边形面对角拆分为三个面。

children.des: Remeshes all the quad faces based on the edge and surface feature angle              specified.
children.desTs: 根据指定的边和表面特征角度重新网格化所有四元面。

children.des: Creates the non-conformal interface on the specified face zones using the specified        retriangulation method.
children.desTs: 使用指定的重新定线方法在指定的面区域上创建非保形界面。

children.des: Enables you to separate the face zones comprising the non-conformal interface between        the cell zones specified. Specify the cell zones where the interface is non-conformal, an        appropriate gap distance, and the critical angle to be used for separating the face zones.        You can also choose to orient the boundary face zones after separation and additionally        write a journal file for the separation operation.
children.desTs: 使您能够分离构成指定单元区域之间非保形界面的面区域。指定界面非保形的单元区域、适当的间隙距离以及用于分离面区域的临界角。您还可以选择在分离后定向边界面区域，并另外为分离操作编写日记文件。

contents.des: Enters the polyhedral mesh generation menu.
contents.desTs: 进入多边形网格生成菜单。

children.des: Merge nodes to remove short edges and small faces. The decision threshold uses         edge size ratio, face size ratio, and (face)         area fraction.
children.desTs: 合并节点以删除短边和小面。决策阈值使用边尺寸比、面尺寸比和（面）面积分数。

children.des: Enters the controls menu for setting poly parameters.
children.desTs: 进入控制菜单以设置多边形参数。

children.des: Sets cell volume distribution function as geometric,            linear, or size-field.
children.desTs: 将单元体积分布函数设置为几何、线性或尺寸场。

children.des: Sets the threshold for the size ratio of two connected edges. Recommended range is           20 to 200.
children.desTs: 设置两条连接边的大小比阈值。建议范围为20到200。

children.des: Sets the threshold for the size ratio of two faces on one cell. Recommended range is           100 to 300.
children.desTs: 设置一个单元格上两个面的大小比例的阈值。建议范围为100到300。

children.des: Sets the minimum threshold that should be preserved as a feature.
children.desTs: 设置应保留为特征的最小阈值。

children.des: Enables poly mesh improvement by smoothing based on the            smooth-controls.
children.desTs: 通过基于平滑控制的平滑来实现多边形网格改进。

children.des: Sets the minimum skewness threshold for cell merge.
children.desTs: 设置单元格合并的最小偏度阈值。

children.des: Selects the default type for non-fluid zones.
children.desTs: 指定非流体区域的默认类型。

children.des: Sets the target skewness when remeshing.
children.desTs: 重新网格化时设置目标倾斜度。

children.des: Sets the threshold for the area of a single face to the cell surface area.           Recommended range is 0.00001 to 0.001.
children.desTs: 将单个面面积的阈值设置为单元表面积。建议范围为0.00001至0.001。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting smoothing parameters for poly mesh.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置多边形网格的平滑参数。

children.des: Sets the number of passes for tet-cell centroid smoothing during the poly mesh              generation phase.
children.desTs: 设置多边形网格生成阶段期间tet-cell重心平滑的遍数。

children.des: Sets the number of passes for tet-cell edge smoothing during the poly mesh              generation phase.
children.desTs: 设置多边形网格生成阶段期间tet-cell边缘平滑的遍数。

children.des: Sets the number of passes for tet-cell Laplace smoothing during the poly mesh              generation phase.
children.desTs: 设置多边形网格生成阶段期间tet-cell Lapplace平滑的遍数。

children.des: Sets the maximum number of movements for a single node during poly mesh              smoothing.
children.desTs: 设置多边形网格平滑期间单个节点的最大移动次数。

children.des: Enables boundary smoothing as part of poly cell smoothing. Default is no.
children.desTs: 启用边界平滑作为多边形单元平滑的一部分。默认值为否。

children.des: Sets the number of improvement passes over the full poly mesh.
children.desTs: 设置整个多边形网格上的改进遍数。

children.des: Constrains movement of nodes to maintain layering during poly mesh              smoothing.
children.desTs: 在多边形网格平滑期间限制节点的移动以保持分层。

children.des: Sets the minimum skewness threshold for poly mesh smoothing.
children.desTs: 设置多边形网格平滑的最小倾斜度阈值。

children.des: Allows you to improve the polyhedral mesh quality based on the         quality-method.
children.desTs: 允许您根据质量方法提高多边形网格质量。

children.des: Enters the local refinement menu.
children.desTs: 进入本地细化菜单。

children.des: Activates the specified regions for refinement.
children.desTs: 激活指定区域进行细化。

children.des: Deactivates the specified regions for refinement.
children.desTs: 停用指定区域进行细化。

children.des: Defines the refinement region according to the specified parameters.
children.desTs: 根据指定的参数定义细化区域。

children.des: Deletes the specified refinement region.
children.desTs: 初始化指定的细化区域。

children.des: Reports the volume of an ideal tetrahedron for the edge length specified.
children.desTs: 报告指定边长的理想四面体的体积。

children.des: Defines the default refinement region encompassing the entire geometry.
children.desTs: 定义包含整个几何体的默认细化区域。

children.des: Lists all refinement region parameters and the activated regions in the           console.
children.desTs: 列出控制台中所有细化区域参数和激活区域。

children.des: Refines the active cells inside the selected region based on the specified           refinement parameters.
children.desTs: 根据指定的细化参数细化选定区域内的活动单元格。

children.des: Asks you to choose from internal-default,         orthoskew or squish quality measure for        mesh improvement.
children.desTs: 要求您从内部默认、正矫正或挤压质量测量中进行选择以改善网格。

children.des: Improves the quality in a local region based on the minimum skewness threshold.
children.desTs: 基于最小偏度阈值提高局部区域的质量。

contents.des: Enters the menu for poly-hexcore mesh.
contents.desTs: 进入poly-hexcore网格菜单。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting  parameters for poly-hexcore mesh.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置六边形网格的参数。

children.des: Determines the types of cells (large cells, small cells, or both) that are going to           be replaced with polyhedra cells in order to avoid any 1:8 cell jumps in the hexcore           region. The default is no and            large-cells.
children.desTs: 确定要用多角体细胞替换的细胞类型（大细胞、小细胞或两者兼而有之），以避免六角体区域中的任何1：8细胞跳跃。默认值为否和大细胞。

children.des: Determines whether or not to apply hexahedra cells in the core region of the mesh.           The default value is yes.
children.desTs: 确定是否在网格的核心区域中应用六边形单元。默认值为是。

children.des: Determines if polyhedra cells are to be applied to the selected regions.
children.desTs: 确定是否将多边形单元应用于选定区域。

contents.des: Prepares the mesh for solving in solution mode by performing a     cleanup operation after the volume mesh has been generated. Operations such as deleting dead     zones, deleting geometry objects, deleting edge zones, deleting unused faces and nodes are     performed during this operation.
contents.desTs: 生成体积网格后，通过执行清理操作来准备网格以在求解模式下求解。在此操作期间执行删除死区、删除几何对象、删除边缘区域、删除未使用的面和节点等操作。

contents.des: Allows you to enable or disable prime meshing for automatic volume mesh generation.
contents.desTs: 允许您启用或禁用主网格化以自动生成体积网格。

contents.des: Enters the prism menu.
contents.desTs: 进入棱镜菜单。

children.des: Enters the prism controls menu.
children.desTs: 进入棱镜控制菜单。

children.des: Enters the prism adjacent zone controls menu.
children.desTs: 进入棱镜相邻区域控制菜单。

children.des: Determines whether or not to project to an adjacent zone. If a zone shares outer              nodes with any of the zones from which the layers are being grown (the “base              zones”), its angle with respect to the growth direction is compared with this              value. If the angle is less than or equal to this value, then the zone will be              projected to. The default value is 75 degrees. See Using Adjacent Zones as the Sides of Prisms for details.
children.desTs: 确定是否投影到邻近区域。如果区域与生长层的任何区域共享外部节点（“基础区域”），将其相对于生长方向的角度与此值进行比较。如果角度小于或等于此值，则将投影到该区域。默认值为75度。有关详细信息，请参阅使用邻近区域作为棱镜边。

children.des: Specifies the angle used for computing the feature normals.
children.desTs: 指定用于计算要素法向的角度。

children.des: Enables/disables the checking of volume, skewness, and handedness of each new cell           and face.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用每个新单元格和面的体积、偏斜度和旋向检查。

children.des: Creates prism layers on one or more boundary face zones based on the offset method,        growth method, number of layers, and rate specified.
children.desTs: 根据偏置方法、生长方法、层数和指定的速率，在一个或多个边界面区域上创建棱镜层。

children.des: Enters the prism improve menu.
children.desTs: 进入棱镜改进菜单。

children.des: Collects and smooths cells in layers around poor quality cells. Cells with quality           worse than the specified threshold value will be identified, and the nodes of the cells           surrounding the poor quality cells will be moved to improve quality.
children.desTs: 对质量较差的细胞周围的细胞进行分层收集和平滑。识别质量低于指定阈值的细胞，并移动质量较差的细胞周围的细胞的节点以提高质量。

children.des: Forcibly smooths cells if cell skewness is still high after regular           smoothing.
children.desTs: 如果定期平滑后细胞倾斜度仍然很高，则强制平滑细胞。

children.des: Specifies the number of cell rings around the skewed cell used by            improve-prism-cells.
children.desTs: 指定改进棱镜单元使用的倾斜单元周围的单元环数量。

children.des: Uses a combination of node movement and optimized smoothing to improve the quality.           This command is a combination of the smooth-prism-cells and            improve-prism-cells commands. The cell aspect ratio will also           be maintained based on the value specified for           max-aspect-ratio.
children.desTs: 使用节点移动和优化平滑的组合来提高质量。此命令是smooth-prism-cells和improve-prism-cells命令的组合。单元长宽比也将基于为max-aspect-ratio指定的值进行维护。

children.des: Enables optimization based smoothing of prism cells. The nodes of cells with quality           worse than the specified threshold value will be moved to improve quality. The cell           aspect ratio will also be maintained based on the value specified for            max-aspect-ratio.
children.desTs: 启用基于优化的棱镜单元平滑。质量低于指定阈值的单元的节点将被移动以提高质量。单元长宽比也将根据为最大长宽比指定的值来维持。

children.des: Specifies the skewness above which prism cells will be smoothed.
children.desTs: 指定倾斜度，超过该倾斜度的棱镜单元将被平滑。

children.des: Shows all prism mesh parameters.
children.desTs: 显示所有棱镜网格参数。

children.des: Enables you to mark the faces to be ignored during prism meshing.
children.desTs: 使您能够标记棱镜网格化期间要忽略的面。

children.des: Enables you to mark the non-manifold prism base nodes. A list of the non-manifold nodes        will be printed in the console. The faces connected to the non-manifold nodes will also be        marked. You can use this command after specifying zone-specific prism settings, prior to        generating the prisms to verify that non-manifold configurations do not exist.
children.desTs: 使您能够标记非总管棱镜基本节点。非总管节点的列表将打印在控制台中。连接到非总管节点的面也将被标记。您可以在指定区域特定的棱镜设置后使用此命令，然后在生成棱镜以验证非总管配置不存在。

children.des: Contains the following options for ignoring prism cells:
children.desTs: 包含以下用于忽略棱镜单元的选项：

children.des: Creates a cavity in regions where prism quality is adequate, but the quality of           adjacent tetrahedra is poor. The cavity is created based on the tetrahedral cell zone,           the quality measure and the corresponding threshold value, and the additional number of           cell rings specified. You can create a cavity comprising only tetrahedral cells or           optionally include prism cells in the cavity created. When prism cells are also included           in the cavity, you can specify whether the non-conformal interface is to be           created.
children.desTs: 在棱镜质量足够但相邻四面体质量较差的区域中创建空腔。该空腔是根据四面体单元区域、质量测量和相应的阈值以及指定的单元环的额外数量创建的。您可以创建仅包含四面体单元的空腔，或者可选地在创建的空腔中包括棱镜单元。当棱镜单元也包括在空腔中时，您可以指定是否创建非保形界面。

children.des: Marks the prism cap faces and tetrahedral cell faces bounding the cavity to be           created in regions where prism quality is adequate, but the quality of adjacent           tetrahedra is poor. Specify the tetrahedral cell zone, the quality measure and the           corresponding threshold value to be used, and the additional number of cell rings based           on which the cavity will be created.
children.desTs: 标记在棱镜质量足够但相邻四面体质量较差的区域中将创建的腔体边界的棱镜帽面和四面体单元面。指定四面体单元区域、要使用的质量测量和相应阈值，以及创建腔体所基于的单元环的额外数量。

children.des: Marks the prism cap faces for ignoring prism cells in regions of poor quality cells           and sharp corners. Specify the prism cell zone and the basis for ignoring prism cells and           the relevant parameters. The prism cells can be ignored based on quality, intersection,           (both enabled by default), warp, and features (both disabled by default). Specify the           quality measure and threshold value to be used for ignoring cells based on quality and           (if applicable) the feature edges for ignoring cells based on features. Additionally,           specify whether cells are to be marked in regions of high aspect ratio and based on           feature angle, and the additional number of cell rings based on which prism cells will be           removed.
children.desTs: 标记棱镜帽面，以忽略质量差单元和尖角区域的棱镜单元。指定棱镜单元区域、忽略棱镜单元的依据和相关参数。根据质量、相交、（默认情况下均启用）、曲速、和特征（默认情况下均禁用）。指定要用于根据质量忽略单元格的质量测量和阈值（如果适用）用于根据特征忽略单元的特征边缘。此外，请指定是否要根据特征角度在高长宽比区域中标记单元，以及根据将删除的棱镜单元指定单元环的额外数量。

children.des: Enables you to remove prism cells in layers around poor quality cells and sharp           corners. Specify the prism cell zone, the basis for ignoring prism cells (quality,           intersection, warp, features) and the relevant parameters. Specify the number of cell           rings to be removed around the marked cells. Cells will be marked for removal in regions           of sharp corners based on quality, intersection, warp, and features (as applicable) and           then extended based on the number of cell rings specified. Additional cells will be           marked for removal in regions of high aspect ratio and based on feature angle (if           applicable) around the exposed prism side. The boundary will be smoothed at feature           corners after the prism cells have been removed. The prism-side faces exposed by the           removal of the prism cells will be collected in a zone named            prism-side-#, while for a zone wall-n,           the faces corresponding to the ignored prism cells will be collected in a zone named            wall-n:ignore. You can also optionally smooth the prism side           nodes from the base node to the cap node to create better triangles for the non-conformal           interface.
children.desTs: 使您能够删除质量较差的单元和尖角周围的层中的棱镜单元。指定棱镜单元区域，这是忽略棱镜单元的基础（质量、相交、扭曲、特征）和相关参数。指定标记单元周围要删除的单元环数量。将根据质量、相交、扭曲、在尖角区域标记单元以删除和特征（如适用），然后根据指定的单元环数量进行扩展。将根据特征角度标记高长宽比区域中的额外单元以删除（如果适用）暴露的棱镜侧周围。移除棱镜单元后，边界将在特征角处平滑。棱镜-通过移除棱镜单元而暴露的侧面将被收集在名为prism-side-#的区域中，而对于区域wall-n，与被忽略的棱镜单元相对应的面将被收集在名为wall-n：ignore的区域中。您还可以选择平滑从基节点到帽节点的棱镜侧节点，以为非保形界面创建更好的三角形。

children.des: Specifies the quality method used during prism generation.
children.desTs: 指定棱镜生成期间使用的质量方法。

children.des: Resets all prism parameters.
children.desTs: 重置所有棱镜参数。

children.des: Contains options for splitting the prism layers after the initial prism layers are        generated, to generate the total number of layers required.
children.desTs: 包含在生成初始棱镜层后拆分棱镜层以生成所需的总层数的选项。

children.des: Enables you to split the prism layers after the initial prism layers are generated,           to generate the total number of layers required. Specify the prism cell zones to be split           and the number of divisions per layer. You can also choose to use the existing growth           rate (default) or specify the growth rate to be used while splitting the prism           layers.
children.desTs: 使您能够在生成初始棱镜层后拆分棱镜层，以生成所需的总层数。指定要拆分的棱镜单元区以及每层的分区数。您还可以选择使用现有的生长率（默认）或指定拆分棱镜层时要使用的生长率。

contents.des: Enters the pyramid menu.
contents.desTs: 进入金字塔菜单。

children.des: Enters the pyramid controls menu.
children.desTs: 进入金字塔控制菜单。

children.des: Sets the threshold dihedral angle used to limit the neighboring faces considered for           pyramid creation. For example, if the value is set to 110° and the angle between a           given quadrilateral face and a neighboring triangular face is greater than 110°, the           resulting pyramid will not include the triangular face.
children.desTs: 设置阈值二面角，用于限制考虑创建金字塔的邻近面。例如，如果该值设置为110°，并且给定的四方形面与邻近的三角形面之间的角度大于110°，则生成的金字塔将不包括三角形面。

children.des: Specifies the fraction of the computed pyramid height (offset) by which the pyramid           heights will be randomly adjusted. The default value is 0, indicating that all pyramids           will have the exact height computed. A value of 0.1, for example, will limit each           adjustment to ±10% of the computed height.
children.desTs: 指定随机调整金字塔高度的计算金字塔高度（偏差）的分数。默认值为0，表示所有金字塔都将计算出精确的高度。例如，值0.1将将每次调整限制为计算高度的±10%。

children.des: Specifies the scaling, to be used to determine the height of the pyramid.
children.desTs: 指定用于确定金字塔高度的比例。

children.des: Specifies the method by which the location of the new vertex of the pyramid will be           determined. The skewness method is used by default.
children.desTs: 指定确定金字塔新顶点位置的方法。默认情况下使用偏度方法。

children.des: Creates a layer of pyramids on the quad face zone.
children.desTs: 在四方面区域上创建金字塔层。

contents.des: Enters the rapid octree menu, which provides text commands for using the Rapid Octree     mesher.
contents.desTs: 进入快速八叉树菜单，该菜单提供用于使用快速八叉树网格划分器的文本命令。

children.des: Enters the boundary layer mesh configuration menu, which provides text commands for        managing the dividing of the isotropic layer at a boundary zone into multiple anisotropic        prismatic layers during the mesh creation. This text command menu is only available when        0 (Projection) is selected through the        /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text command.
children.desTs: 进入边界层网格配置菜单，该菜单提供文本命令，用于管理在网格创建期间将边界区的各向同性层划分为多个各向异性棱镜层。仅当通过/mesh/rapid-octree/边界处理文本命令选择0（投影）时，此文本命令菜单才可用。

children.des: Adds a definition for the creation of multiple anisotropic prismatic layers at one           or more boundary zones during the mesh creation.
children.desTs: 添加在网格创建期间在一个或多个边界区域创建多个各向异性棱镜层的定义。

children.des: Deletes a single definition for the creation of multiple anisotropic prismatic           layers during the mesh creation.
children.desTs: 在网格创建过程中为创建多个各向异性棱镜层指定单个定义。

children.des: Deletes all of the definitions for the creation of multiple anisotropic prismatic           layers during the mesh creation.
children.desTs: 在网格创建期间初始化创建多个各向异性棱镜层的所有定义。

children.des: Edits a definition for the creation of multiple anisotropic prismatic layers during           the mesh creation.
children.desTs: 在网格创建期间编辑创建多个各向异性棱镜层的定义。

children.des: Lists the settings for all of the definitions for the creation of multiple           anisotropic prismatic layers during the mesh creation.
children.desTs: 列出在网格创建过程中创建多个各向异性棱柱层的所有定义的设置。

children.des: Allows you to select a boundary mesh optimization mode, in order to specify that the        cells in the layer adjacent to boundary zones are optimized in terms of orthogonal quality        at the time of meshing. The available modes include one based on a conjugate gradient method        (conjugate-gradient) and one based on a discrete mesh optimization        scheme (dmo). The dmo mode can result in        significantly less defeaturing compared to the conjugate-gradient        mode, and the conjugate-gradient mode can help improve cell quality        for mesh configurations with boundary layer cells that have a higher aspect ratio. This text        command menu is only available when 0        (Projection) is selected through the        /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text command.
children.desTs: 允许您选择边界网格优化模式，以指定网格化时与边界区域相邻的层中的单元在垂直质量方面进行优化。可用的模式包括基于共乘梯度法的模式（结合梯度）和基于离散网格优化方案（dmo）的方案。与结合梯度模式相比，dmo模式可以导致明显更少的失败，并且，共乘梯度模式可以帮助提高具有更高长宽比的边界层单元的网格配置的单元质量。只有当通过/mesh/rapid-octree/Boundary-Treatment文本命令选择0（投影）时，此文本命令菜单才可用。

children.des: Selects the boundary treatment option. Enter 0 for the        Boundary Projection treatment or 1 for the Cartesian Snapping        treatment.
children.desTs: 禁用边界处理选项。为“边界投影”处理输入0，或为“笛卡尔捕捉”处理输入1。

children.des: Creates a mesh using the Rapid Octree mesher.
children.desTs: 使用Rapid Octree网格创建网格。

children.des: Deletes all cells that have an Inverse Orthogonal Quality that is worse than 0.99. When        a cell is deleted, new face zones of type symmetry are created for the adjacent cells on the        faces that were shared with the deleted cell. This text command should be used with care in        order to avoid unwanted effects during the solution (such as solution errors due to bad        geometry representation, or even solver divergence). It is only recommended when over 500        bad cells have been produced due to an attempt to improve the geometry resolution or the        creation of a boundary layer mesh (see Improve Geometry Resolution or Boundary Layer Mesh in the Fluent User's Guide, respectively).
children.desTs: 删除所有反垂直质量低于0.99的单元格。删除单元格时，将为与删除单元格共享的面上的相邻单元格创建对称类型的新面区域。应谨慎使用此文本命令，以避免在解决过程中产生不必要的影响（例如由于几何表示不好而导致的解错误，甚至求解器分歧）。仅当由于试图提高几何分辨率或创建边界层网格而产生超过500个坏单元时才建议使用（分别请参阅《流利用户指南》中的“提高几何分辨率”或“边界层网格”）。

children.des: Enters the geometry menu, which allows you to specify inputs such as material points        and mesh objects.
children.desTs: 进入几何菜单，该菜单允许您指定材料点和网格对象等输入。

children.des: Defines/modifies the bounding box around the geometry.
children.desTs: 定义/修改几何体周围的边界框。

children.des: Enables/disables the distribution of the input geometry across partitions / compute           nodes, so that it is not copied to each process. This reduces the memory requirements of           the mesh generation significantly, especially for geometries with a high number of           triangles. Note that this geometric distribution is enabled by default and is           automatically deactivated if the geometry is not fully enclosed by the defined bounding           box.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用输入几何在分区/计算节点之间的分布，以便其不会复制到每个进程。这显着降低了网格生成的内存需求，尤其是对于具有大量三角形的几何。请注意，默认情况下启用此几何分布，如果几何没有完全被定义的边界框包围，则会自动停用。

children.des: Allows you to apply the Rapid Octree mesher to a defined mesh object or geometry           object rather than all available surface zones. Note that using a mesh object with           multiple volumetric regions allows you to generate multiple disconnected cell zones that           can be coupled by a non-conformal mesh interface in the solution mode; all other input           objects result in the creation of a single volume / cell zone.
children.desTs: 允许您将快速八叉树网格应用于定义的网格对象或几何对象，而不是所有可用的表面区域。请注意，使用具有多个体积区域的网格对象允许您生成多个不相连的单元区域，这些单元区域可以通过解决方案模式中的非共形网格界面进行耦合;所有其他输入对象都会创建单个体积/单元区域。

children.des: Expands the currently defined bounding box to make a specific cell size possible in           the mesh. You can enter the edge length that you want in the mesh, and a message is           printed in the console that tells you what level you must use to achieve your desired           edge length, along with the new bounding box extents.
children.desTs: 展开当前定义的边界框，以使网格中的特定单元大小成为可能。您可以输入网格中想要的边长，控制台中会打印一条消息，告诉您必须使用什么级别来实现所需的边长，以及新的边界框范围。

children.des: Redefines the bounding box extents to encompass all of the surfaces of the currently           selected geometry, and updates the base length scale used in the mesh generation           process.
children.desTs: 重新定义边界框范围以涵盖当前选定几何体的所有表面，并更新网格生成过程中使用的基本长度比例。

children.des: Specifies the volume to be filled by the mesh.
children.desTs: 指定网格要填充的体积。

children.des: Enables an option that improves the geometry resolution, by applying an iterative        projection of boundary faces onto the geometry, with the goal of minimizing the distance of        the boundary face centroid to the geometry. This “face projection” is then        internally iterated with mesh smoothing steps to improve the cell quality. This option is        only used when 0 (Projection) is selected        through the /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text        command.
children.desTs: 通过将边界面的迭代投影应用到几何图形上，启用一个可以提高几何分辨率的选项，目标是最小化边界面重心与几何图形的距离。然后，通过网格平滑步骤对此“面投影”进行内部迭代，以提高单元质量。仅当通过/mesh/rapid-octree/边界处理文本命令选择0（投影）时使用此选项。

children.des: Enters the mesh sizing menu, which allows you to manage size        functions, that is, local refinement settings for individual or groups of zones.
children.desTs: 进入网格大小调整菜单，该菜单允许您管理大小功能，即单个区域或区域组的局部优化设置。

children.des: Adds a size function definition, that is, a target mesh size for a list of surface           zones, along with local angular or proximity refinement settings. This text command is           only available when 0 (Projection) is           selected through the /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text           command.
children.desTs: 添加大小函数定义，即曲面区域列表的目标网格大小，以及局部角度或接近度细化设置。此文本命令仅在通过/mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment文本命令选择0（投影）时可用。

children.des: Sets the default cell size for the geometry.
children.desTs: 设置几何图元的默认单元大小。

children.des: Changes a size function definition. This text command is only available when           0 (Projection) is selected through the           /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text command.
children.desTs: 更改尺寸函数定义。仅当通过/mesh/rapid-octree/Boundary-taste文本命令选择0（投影）时，此文本命令才可用。

children.des: Deletes all size function definitions. This text command is only available when           0 (Projection) is selected through the           /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text command.
children.desTs: 删除所有尺寸函数定义。此文本命令仅在通过/mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment文本命令选择0（投影）时可用。

children.des: Deletes a single size function definition. This text command is only available when           0 (Projection) is selected through the           /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text command.
children.desTs: 指定单个大小函数定义。仅当通过/mesh/rapid-octree/边界处理文本命令选择0（投影）时，此文本命令才可用。

children.des: Lists all of the size function definitions. This text command is only available when           0 (Projection) is selected through the           /mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment text command.
children.desTs: 列出所有尺寸函数定义。此文本命令仅在通过/mesh/rapid-octree/boundary-treatment文本命令选择0（投影）时可用。

children.des: Sets the maximum cell size in the octree mesh.
children.desTs: 设置八叉树网格中的最大像元大小。

children.des: Enables/disables the smooth mesh coarsening option, which causes the refined cells           to better follow the geometry. This option can reduce the overall cell count while           maintaining a comparable level of accuracy.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用平滑网格粗化选项，这会使细化的单元更好地遵循几何图形。此选项可以减少总体单元计数，同时保持相当的准确性水平。

children.des: Sets the minimum number of layers of constant-size cells that are added to the layer           adjacent to the surfaces of the geometry. These cells are generally isotropic, with the           dimensions determined by the surface mesh.
children.desTs: 设置添加到与几何体表面相邻的层的恒定大小单元的最小层数。这些单元通常是各向同性的，其尺寸由表面网格确定。

children.des: Controls the transition from fine cells near the surfaces to the coarse cells deeper           in the fluid volume. Enter 0 for the fastest possible transition, or higher numbers for a           slower transition; as the value increases, so too will the thickness of cell layers of           the same size at each stage of the transition. The number of layers at each intermediate           stage of coarsening will be at least 2 to the power of the number you enter here.
children.desTs: 控制从表面附近的细单元到流体体积中更深处的粗单元的过渡。输入0代表最快的过渡，或输入更高的数字代表较慢的过渡;随着值的增加，每个过渡阶段相同大小的单元层的厚度也会增加。每个粗化中间阶段的层数至少是您在这里输入的数字的2的乘方。

children.des: Enters the rapid octree refinement regions menu, which allows you to manage the        refinement regions.
children.desTs: 进入快速八叉树细化区域菜单，该菜单允许您管理细化区域。

children.des: Adds a refinement region to the domain. After you enter a name for the region, you           can define the following:
children.desTs: 将细化区域添加到域中。输入区域的名称后，您可以定义以下内容：

children.des: Deletes a refinement region.
children.desTs: 指定细化区域。

children.des: Edits a refinement region. After you enter the name of the region you want to edit,           you can define the following:
children.desTs: 编辑细化区域。输入要编辑的区域的名称后，您可以定义以下内容：

children.des: Lists all of the refinement regions.
children.desTs: 列出所有细化区域。

children.des: Lists all of the settings for a specified refinement region.
children.desTs: 列出指定优化区域的所有设置。

children.des: Attempts to restore the object state (including its surfaces) as it was prior to the        meshing operation performed by the Rapid Octree mesher.
children.desTs: 尝试将对象状态（包括其表面）恢复为Rapid Octree网格处理器执行网格化操作之前的状态。

children.des: Sets the verbosity of the messages printed by the Rapid Octree mesher.
children.desTs: 设置Rapid Octree网格打印机打印的消息的详细程度。

contents.des: Reverses face node orientation.
contents.desTs: 反转面节点方向。

contents.des: Clears the entire mesh.
contents.desTs: 清除整个网格。

contents.des: Resets all parameters to their default value.
contents.desTs: 将所有参数重置为其默认值。

contents.des: Contains options for creating scoped prism controls for mesh objects.
contents.desTs: 包含用于为网格对象创建范围棱镜控件的选项。

children.des: Creates a new scoped prism control based on the parameters and        scope specified. Specify the name, offset method, first height or aspect ratio, number of        layers, and rate or last percent. Select the mesh object and set the scope         (fluid-regions, named-regions, or         solid-regions). Specify the zones to grow prisms         (all-zones, only-walls,         selected-face-zones, or selected-labels,        or solid-fluid-interface). When         named-regions and/or selected-face-zones        or selected-labels are selected, specify the volume and/or boundary        scope. If interior baffle zones are selected, retain the option to grow prisms on both sides        of the baffles or disable it to grow prisms on one side.
children.desTs: 根据指定的参数和范围创建新的范围棱镜控件。指定名称、补偿方法、第一高度或长宽比、层数以及比率或最后百分比。选择网格对象并设置范围（流体区域、指定区域或实体区域）。指定生长棱镜的区域（所有区域、仅墙、选定面区域或选定标签或固液界面）。选择指定区域和/或选定面区域或选定标签时，指定体积和/或边界范围。如果选择了内部挡板区域，请保留在挡板两侧生长棱镜的选项或禁用在一侧生长棱镜的选项。

children.des: Deletes the specified scoped prism control.
children.desTs: 初始化指定的作用域棱镜控件。

children.des: Enables you to specify scoped prism growth options. Select Fix First         Height if required, and specify the gap factor, maximum aspect ratio, prism        quality method, and the threshold quality value for stair stepping.
children.desTs: 使您能够指定范围棱镜生长选项。如果需要，选择“固定第一高度”，并指定间隙因子、最大长宽比、棱镜质量方法和阶梯质量阈值。

children.des: Lists all the defined scoped prism controls.
children.desTs: 列出所有已定义的作用域棱镜控件。

children.des: Modifies the specified control based on the parameters specified.
children.desTs: 根据指定的参数修改指定的控件。

children.des: Sets the number of layers to maintain poly-prism characteristics.
children.desTs: 设置保持多棱镜特征的层数。

children.des: Reads in the specified scoped prism control file (*.pzmcontrol).
children.desTs: 读入指定作用域的prism控制文件（*.pzmcontrol）。

children.des: Used to specify face zones that should not be imprinted during prism generation.
children.desTs: 用于指定棱镜生成期间不应压印的面区域。

children.des: Used to specify various controls for scoped prisms. Prompts include setting iterations        for normal based prisms, smoothing, prism improvement, automatic node movement, and warp        improvement. Prompts also include checks for stair-step interactions, as well as proximity,        quality, and the exposure of quad quality. Automatic stair-stepping occurs during prism        generation based on the proximity and quality limits. You can intentionally avoid        stair-stepping by setting the last three prompts (proximity, quality, and the exposure of        quad quality) to no, although you may also retain some poor quality        cells.
children.desTs: 用于指定范围棱镜的各种控制。警告包括为基于法向的棱镜设置迭代、平滑、棱镜改进、自动节点移动和扭曲改进。警告还包括检查阶梯交互以及接近度、质量、以及四倍质量的曝光。根据接近度和质量限制，在棱镜生成过程中发生自动阶梯。您可以故意避免阶梯-将最后三个提示（接近度、质量和四元质量的曝光）设置为否，尽管您也可能保留一些质量较差的单元格。

children.des: Used to enable stair-stepping of exposed						quadrilateral faces (exposed quads) on prism cells						when generating a tetrahedral mesh. Stair-stepping						will prevent pyramids from being created on these						exposed quads, which generally would lead to poor						quality in the exposed quad location
children.desTs: 用于在生成四面体网格时启用棱柱单元上的暴露四边形面（暴露四边形）的阶梯步进。阶梯步进将防止在这些暴露四边形上创建金字塔，这通常会导致暴露四边形位置的质量较差

children.des: Writes the scoped prism controls to a prism control file (*.pzmcontrol). Specify the        scoped prism file name.
children.desTs: 将作用域棱镜控件写入棱镜控制文件（*. pzmcontrolt）。指定作用域棱镜文件名。

list.des: commands used to create, manage, modify and delete    cell zones and volume mesh.
list.desTs: 用于创建、管理、修改和删除单元区域和体积网格的命令。

contents.des: Contains options for modifying the selected objects based on the associated CAD entities andattaching/detaching the CAD entities from the objects. This menu is available when the CADAssemblies tree is created during CAD import.
contents.desTs: 包含用于根据关联的CAD实体修改所选对象以及从对象上连接/分离CAD实体的选项。当在CAD导入期间创建CADAssemble树时，此菜单可用。

children.des: Attaches CAD entities to the selected geometry/mesh objects. Select the geometry/mesh objectsand specify the path for the CAD entities to be associated with the objects. The selectedgeometry/mesh objects will be associated with the CAD entities which will then be locked.
children.desTs: 将CAD实体附加到选定的几何/网格对象。选择几何/网格对象并指定与对象关联的CAD实体的路径。选定的几何/网格对象将与随后将被锁定的CAD实体关联。

children.des: Detaches all the CAD objects associated with the geometry/mesh objects. Specify the type ofobjects (geom or mesh) to be detached. Allassociation will be removed and the geometry/mesh objects will be independent of changes to the CADentities.
children.desTs: 分离与几何/网格对象关联的所有CAD对象。指定要分离的对象（几何或网格）的类型。所有关联将被删除，并且几何/网格对象将独立于对CAD实体的更改。

children.des: Detaches the CAD objects associated with the specified geometry/mesh objects. All associationwill be removed and the selected geometry/mesh objects will be independent of changes to the CADentities.
children.desTs: 分离与指定的几何/网格对象关联的CAD对象。所有关联将被删除，并且所选的几何/网格对象将独立于对CAD实体的更改。

children.des: Returns a list of the CAD entities associated with the objects selected.
children.desTs: 返回与选定对象关联的CAD图元的列表。

children.des: Restores the geometry/mesh objects from the associated CAD objects.
children.desTs: 从关联的CAD对象中恢复几何/网格对象。

children.des: Unlocks the CAD objects associated with the selected geometry/mesh objects.
children.desTs: 解锁与选定几何/网格对象关联的CAD对象。

children.des: Updates the specified geometry/mesh objects based on changes to the associated CADobjects.
children.desTs: 根据对关联CAD对象的更改更新指定的几何体/网格对象。

children.des: Updates all geometry/mesh objects based on changes to the associated CAD objects. Specify thetype of objects (geom or mesh) to beupdated.
children.desTs: 根据对相关CAD对象的更改更新所有几何/网格对象。指定要更新的对象（几何或网格）的类型。

contents.des: Allows you to change the object type (geom, or mesh).
contents.desTs: 允许您更改对象类型（地理或网格）。

contents.des: Checks the mesh on the specified objects for connectivity and orientation of faces. The     domain extents, volume statistics, and face area statistics will be reported along with the     results of other checks on the mesh.
contents.desTs: 检查指定对象上的网格的连接性和面的方向。域范围、体积统计信息和面面积统计信息将与网格上的其他检查结果一起报告。

contents.des: Creates the object based on the priority, cell zone type, face zone(s), edge zone(s), and object type specified. You can specify the object name or retain the default blank entry to have the object name generated automatically.
contents.desTs: 根据指定的优先级、单元区域类型、面区域、边缘区域和对象类型创建对象。您可以指定对象名称或保留默认空白条目以自动生成对象名称。

contents.des: Creates and activates the domain comprising the face zone(s) from the object(s) specified.
contents.desTs: 创建并激活由指定对象的面部区域组成的域。

contents.des: Creates a face group and an edge group comprising the face zone(s) and edge zone(s) included in the specified object(s), respectively.
contents.desTs: 创建面组和边组，分别由指定对象中包含的面区域和边缘区域组成。

contents.des: Allows you to create intersection loops for objects.
contents.desTs: 允许您为对象创建相交循环。

contents.des: Creates multiple objects by creating an object per face zone specified. The objects will be named automatically based on the prefix and priority specified.
contents.desTs: 通过为每个指定的面区域创建一个对象来创建多个对象。这些对象将根据指定的前缀和优先级自动命名。

contents.des: Contains options for creating a new mesh object by wrapping or remeshing existing objects.
contents.desTs: 包含通过包裹或重新网格化现有对象来创建新网格对象的选项。

children.des: Creates a new mesh object by remeshing geometry objects individually or collectively.
children.desTs: 通过单独或集体重新网格化几何对象来创建新的网格对象。

children.des: Creates a new mesh object by wrapping the specified objects individually or collectively.
children.desTs: 通过单独或共同包裹指定对象来创建新网格对象。

contents.des: Deletes the specified object(s).
contents.desTs: 初始化指定的对象。

contents.des: Deletes all the defined objects.
contents.desTs: 初始化所有定义的对象。

contents.des: Deletes all the defined geom objects.
contents.desTs: 初始化所有定义的geom对象。

contents.des: Deletes all the faces and edges that are not included in any defined objects.
contents.desTs: 删除任何已定义对象中未包含的所有面和边。

contents.des: Extracts the edge zone(s) from the face zone(s) included in the specified object(s), based on the edge-feature-angle value specified (/objects/set/set-edge-feature-angle).
contents.desTs: 根据指定的边缘-特征-角度值（/objects/set/set-edge-feature-angle），从指定对象中包含的面部区域中提取边缘区域。

contents.des: Enables you to imprint the edges comprising the object on to the object face zones to improve feature capture for mesh objects. You can specify the number of imprinting iterations to be performed.
contents.desTs: 使您能够将构成对象的边缘压印到对象面区域上，以改善网格对象的特征捕获。您可以指定要执行的压印迭代次数。

contents.des: Enables you to improve the surface mesh quality for mesh objects. Select the mesh objects and the method for improving the surface mesh. The smooth-and-improve method improves the mesh by a combination of smoothing, swapping, and surface mesh improvement operations. Object normals are correctly oriented and island faces are also deleted. You can optionally coarsen the surface mesh by specifying a suitable coarsening factor. Additional imprinting operations can be done to improve feature capture on the surface mesh. The surface-remesh method improves the mesh by remeshing based on the current size field. Object normals are correctly oriented and island faces are also deleted.
contents.desTs: 使您能够提高网格对象的表面网格质量。选择网格对象和改进表面网格的方法。平滑改进方法通过平滑、交换、和表面网格改进操作。对象法向正确，岛面也被删除。您可以选择通过指定合适的粗化因子来粗化表面网格。可以执行额外的压印操作改善表面网格上的特征捕获。表面重新网格方法通过基于当前尺寸场重新网格来改善网格。对象法向正确定向，岛面也被删除。

contents.des: Contains options for connecting overlapping and intersecting face zones.
contents.desTs: 包含用于连接重叠和交叉面区域的选项。

children.des: Allows you to specify one or more mesh objects to be added to an existing mesh        object.
children.desTs: 允许您指定要添加到现有网格对象的一个或多个网格对象。

children.des: Allows you to select a cell zone type (solid, fluid or dead) for a specific region.
children.desTs: 允许您选择特定区域的单元区类型（固体、液体或死）。

children.des: Closed cell zone regions are computed from the specified mesh object. You may include a material point, if desired.
children.desTs: 封闭单元区域是从指定的网格对象计算的。如果需要，可以包括材质点。

children.des: Used to enable or disable automatic post-remesh operation after join or intersect.
children.desTs: 用于在连接或相交后启用或禁用自动重新网格后操作。

children.des: Used to enable or disable automatic post-remesh operation after join or intersect.
children.desTs: 用于在连接或相交后启用或禁用自动重新网格后操作。

children.des: Allows you to specify one or more mesh objects to be connected in one mesh object.
children.desTs: 允许您指定要在一个网格对象中连接的一个或多个网格对象。

children.des: Removes a closed cell zone region and all of its face zones, except those which are shared by other regions, from the specified mesh object.
children.desTs: 从指定的网格对象中移除闭合单元区域及其所有面区域（由其他区域共享的区域除外）。

children.des: Connects two intersecting face zones within specified angle and tolerance.
children.desTs: 在指定的角度和公差内连接两个相交的面区域。

children.des: Connects two overlapping face zones within specified angle and tolerance.
children.desTs: 在指定的角度和公差范围内连接两个重叠的面区域。

children.des: Lists details of region type, volume, material point, and comprising face zones for the topological regions computed for the specified mesh object.
children.desTs: 列出为指定网格对象计算的拓扑区域的区域类型、体积、材质点和组成面区域的详细信息。

children.des: Specified regions are joined into a single region.
children.desTs: 指定的面域将合并为单个面域。

children.des: Enables you to specify a new name for a specified region.
children.desTs: 使您能够为指定地区指定新名称。

contents.des: Contains options for creating and managing face zone labels.
contents.desTs: 包含用于创建和管理面区域标签的选项。

children.des: Adds the specified face zones to the existing face zone label for an object.
children.desTs: 将指定的面区域添加到对象的现有面区域标签。

children.des: Creates a new face zone label for the specified face zones.
children.desTs: 为指定的面区域创建新的面区域标签。

children.des: Creates a new face zone label for all the face zones in every object.
children.desTs: 为每个对象中的所有面部区域创建新的面部区域标签。

children.des: Creates a new face zone label for each face zone in the object.
children.desTs: 为对象中的每个面部区域创建新的面部区域标签。

children.des: Deletes the specified face zone labels.
